original: khro bo zhe sdang gnas pa skyes //
analyzed: khro bo zhe sdang gnas pa skyes //
translated: Anger is the abode of hatred, born

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the above,

original: khro bo dang zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: khro bo dang zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Akshobhya is the nature of the purity of anger and hatred.

original: de nyid kyi gnas ni yi ge h'um ste de las skyes pa ni de yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i mi bskyod pa de nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi gnas ni yi ge h'um ste de las skyes pa ni de yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i mi bskyod pa de nyid do //
translated: His abode is the syllable hum, and born from that is Akshobhya himself, who arises from the transformation of that syllable.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is he like?

original: rtag pa gsod pa ni zhe sdang rnam par dag pa la sogs pa ni brtson pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rtag pa gsod pa ni zhe sdang rnam par dag pa la sogs pa ni brtson pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is the slayer of the permanent, who is endowed with the practice of the purity of hatred, and so forth.

original: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyang sgrub pa po rnams mchog gi chos can ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes thos par mdzad pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyang sgrub pa po rnams mchog gi chos can ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes thos par mdzad pa 'grub bo //
translated: That very Bhagavat, the practitioner, is the supreme one, who is endowed with the Dharma, and who accomplishes the hearing of the wisdom of the dharmadhatu.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gsod pa'i zhe sdang dang khro ba gsod pa ste /
analyzed: gsod pa'i zhe sdang dang khro ba gsod pa ste /
translated: It is because he is the slayer of the hatred and anger of the slayer.

original: de'i don ni dgos pas so zhes ston to //
analyzed: de'i don ni dgos pas so zhes ston to //
translated: The meaning of that is taught by the word ‚Äúpurpose.‚Äù

original: chen po ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gti mug rnams sel bar bya ba'i phyir skyes bu ni snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gsum ste /
analyzed: chen po ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gti mug rnams sel bar bya ba'i phyir skyes bu ni snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gsum ste /
translated: The great beings are the three Tathagatas, Amitabha and so forth, who are born in order to eliminate desire, hatred and ignorance.

original: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni sgom pa gang las byung ba de ni skyes bu chen po'i dam @180b tshig ste rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal to zhes pa dang sbyar te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni sgom pa gang las byung ba de ni skyes bu chen po'i dam @180b tshig ste rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal to zhes pa dang sbyar te /
translated: The commitment of those is the meditation from which they arise, which is the commitment of the great beings.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the creation stage.

original: yang na rdo rje bdag po ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ba rnams so //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje bdag po ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ba rnams so //
translated: Alternatively, the lord of the vajra is the yogis of the completion stage.

original: de dag thams cad 'dod chags ni 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags par pa rnams kyi de nyid ni bzhi pa ste de'i don sgom pa ni mngon du byed pa ste /
analyzed: de dag thams cad 'dod chags ni 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags par pa rnams kyi de nyid ni bzhi pa ste de'i don sgom pa ni mngon du byed pa ste /
translated: The reality of all of them, of desire, of freedom from desire and of the state of desire, is the fourth, and the meditation on that reality is the actualization of it.

original: 'dod chags de nyid don sgom pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags de nyid don sgom pa'o //
translated: This is the meditation on the reality of desire.

original: de'i tshe de rnams kyis 'dod chags la sogs pa'i gsum po rnam par dag pa las byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdzad pa ni thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe de rnams kyis 'dod chags la sogs pa'i gsum po rnam par dag pa las byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdzad pa ni thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, they will attain the perfect, complete enlightenment arisen from the purification of the three, passion and so forth.

original: sems can kun ni smig rgyu la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams te /
analyzed: sems can kun ni smig rgyu la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams te /
translated: All beings are the signs of a mirage and so forth.

original: de dag gis phan 'dod pa ni de kho na nyid bstan par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gis phan 'dod pa ni de kho na nyid bstan par byed pa'o //
translated: The desire to benefit them is the teaching of reality.

original: spyan la sogs pa ni las kyi phyag rgya ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: spyan la sogs pa ni las kyi phyag rgya ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: Eyes and so forth are the action seal and so forth.

original: rig pa chen mo ni de rnams nyid byed pa yan lag 'khrug pa'i sbyor ba la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa chen mo ni de rnams nyid byed pa yan lag 'khrug pa'i sbyor ba la mkhas pa'o //
translated: The great knowledge is the skill in the practice of the shaking of the limbs of those very ones.

original: 'dod pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa ste /
translated: Passion is passion and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi don ni lhan cig skyes pa bstan pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi don ni lhan cig skyes pa bstan pa ste /
translated: The meaning of those is the teaching of the innate.

original: de la brtson pa ni mtshon par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de la brtson pa ni mtshon par byed pa'o //
translated: The one who is devoted to that is the revealer.

original: de rnams la brten nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i rim pas /
analyzed: de rnams la brten nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i rim pas /
translated: In dependence on those, the enjoyment of passion is the stage of joy and so forth.

original: ji ltar 'dod pa ni 'dod pa'i lha'i rnam pa bsgom pas rnal 'byor ba rnams 'grub ba ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur te mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa ni 'dod pa'i lha'i rnam pa bsgom pas rnal 'byor ba rnams 'grub ba ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur te mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The yogis who are successful by meditating on the form of the desired deity, i.e., who attain power, are those who have attained the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: gti mug ni yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: gti mug ni yi ge aom mo //
translated: Delusion is the syllable Om.

original: dam tshig ni yi ge a'a:'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni yi ge a'a:'o //
translated: Vow is the syllable Ah.

original: 'byung ba ni yi ge h'um ngo //üîΩde rnams rig pa ni sngags rnams kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir rgyal pos te bdag po'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba ni yi ge h'um ngo // de rnams rig pa ni sngags rnams kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir rgyal pos te bdag po'o //
translated: Emergence is the syllable Hum.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rdo rje can no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rdo rje can no //
translated: Those are the kings of the mantras because they are the principal ones, and they are the lords because they are the nature of the Tathagatas.

original: de rnams kyi ma ning gi gnas ni 'jug pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i bzlas pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi ma ning gi gnas ni 'jug pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i bzlas pa ste /
translated: The neuter state of those is the recitation that is free from exhalation and so forth.

original: de 'byung bas na 'grub pa ni de rnams rdzogs pas sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ba la mchog gi dngos grub ster ba ste rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de 'byung bas na 'grub pa ni de rnams rdzogs pas sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ba la mchog gi dngos grub ster ba ste rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Since that arises, the accomplishment is the bestowal of the supreme power upon the yogi who has completed the recitation, i.e., the stage of vajra recitation.

original: de bzhin du khro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de bzhin du khro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Similarly, with regard to the line beginning with ‚Äúanger,‚Äù

original: khro ba dang zhe sdang gi gnas ni khro ba la sogs pa'i rigs las skyes pa ni khyi la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: khro ba dang zhe sdang gi gnas ni khro ba la sogs pa'i rigs las skyes pa ni khyi la sogs pa'o //
translated: The abode of anger and hatred is born from the family of anger, etc., and is the dog, etc.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: rtag tu ni dus thams cad du gsod pa la brtson pa ni phyugs yin pa'i phyir gzhan rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba can te /üîΩde rnams kyis kha na ma tho ba med @181a * //
analyzed: rtag tu ni dus thams cad du gsod pa la brtson pa ni phyugs yin pa'i phyir gzhan rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba can te / de rnams kyis kha na ma tho ba med @181a * //
translated: Always, at all times, devoted to killing, is the animal, because of being devoted to killing.

original: pa'i lcags kyu rnyed la /
analyzed: pa'i lcags kyu rnyed la /
translated: Having obtained the iron hook of sinlessness,üîΩthe meaning of killing is the offering of the sacrificial cake by the process of purification, etc., because of the removal of ordinary conceptualization.

original: gsod pa'i don ni sbyong ba la sogs pa'i rim pas tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa sel bas gtor mar phul na mchog gi chos can ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sgrub pa po ste /
analyzed: gsod pa'i don ni sbyong ba la sogs pa'i rim pas tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa sel bas gtor mar phul na mchog gi chos can ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sgrub pa po ste /
translated: The supreme being is the practitioner who is free of conceptualization.

original: de la grub par gyur pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dngos grub ster ba ste sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de la grub par gyur pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dngos grub ster ba ste sgrub pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment for him is the bestowal of the powers of Vairochana, etc.

original: chen po ni mngon par byang chub pa dang rdo rje bzlas pa dag go //
analyzed: chen po ni mngon par byang chub pa dang rdo rje bzlas pa dag go //
translated: The great one is the manifest enlightenment and the vajra repetition.

original: skyes bu ni skyes pa la sogs pa'i sha rnams kyis dam tshig ni /
analyzed: skyes bu ni skyes pa la sogs pa'i sha rnams kyis dam tshig ni /
translated: The pledge of the men, etc., is the flesh of the men, etc.

original: lcags kyu nye bar phul ba gang las byung ba de ni skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig ste /
analyzed: lcags kyu nye bar phul ba gang las byung ba de ni skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig ste /

original: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal to zhes snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal to zhes snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: Great Vajradhara spoke thus, as before.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pas zhi ba la sogs pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /üîΩye shes 'khor lo can rnams kyi //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pas zhi ba la sogs pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir / ye shes 'khor lo can rnams kyi //
translated: In order to explain pacification and so forth by means of the creation stage,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚Äúthe wheel of awareness holders,‚Äù and so forth.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas snying ga ni ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su aom las byung ba'i rtsi bas brgyad pa'i 'khor lo dkar po bsgoms la /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas snying ga ni ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su aom las byung ba'i rtsi bas brgyad pa'i 'khor lo dkar po bsgoms la /
translated: The practitioner of Vairocana, in the heart of the awareness being in the heart, in the center of a moon disc, should visualize an eight-spoked wheel arisen from o·πÉ, white in color.

original: mdun du yang ye shes rdo rje can ni bsgrub bya nad pa ste /
analyzed: mdun du yang ye shes rdo rje can ni bsgrub bya nad pa ste /
translated: In front of him, the one to be healed, the patient, is the ‚Äúholder of the awareness vajra.‚Äù

original: de nyid gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par bsams la /
analyzed: de nyid gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par bsams la /
translated: Visualizing him in the center of a moon disc,

original: bsgrub bya de nyid kyi dbus ni sgo dgu'i nang 'khor lo ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i ngo bo'i don ni 'od zer dgu dkar po spros la nad pa'i sgo dgu la zhugs par bsams na de'i tshe zhi ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya de nyid kyi dbus ni sgo dgu'i nang 'khor lo ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i ngo bo'i don ni 'od zer dgu dkar po spros la nad pa'i sgo dgu la zhugs par bsams na de'i tshe zhi ba'o //
translated: If one visualizes the object to be accomplished in the center of that, and the wheel in the middle of the nine doors, the meaning of the nature of the concentration being, as nine white light rays emanated, entering the nine doors of the patient, at that time there is peace.

analyzed: ye shes rdo rje can rnams kyi //
translated: The vajra of the gnosis beings

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: snga ma bzhin du mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar yi ge h'um las byung ba'i kha dog nag po rtse dgu pa bsams la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar yi ge h'um las byung ba'i kha dog nag po rtse dgu pa bsams la /
translated: As before, the yogin of Ak·π£obhya should visualize a nine-spoked wheel arisen from the syllable h≈´·πÉ in the heart of the gnosis being.

original: mdun du yang ye shes rdo rje can ni gdug pa'i bsgrub bya rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par bsams la /
analyzed: mdun du yang ye shes rdo rje can ni gdug pa'i bsgrub bya rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par bsams la /
translated: Also in front, the vajra of the gnosis beings is the object to be subdued, abiding in the center of the vajra ma·πá·∏çala, the center of the sun ma·πá·∏çala.

original: de'i sgo dgu la rdo rje ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: de'i sgo dgu la rdo rje ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i ngo bo ste /

original: de'i don ni 'od zer nag po dgu spros la /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'od zer nag po dgu spros la /

analyzed: gdug pa'i sgo dgu la zhugs par bsams na de'i tshe gsod pa'o //

original: rin chen ye shes can rnams kyi //
analyzed: rin chen ye shes can rnams kyi //
translated: The jewel for those with jewel intuition,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pas ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar yi ge sv'a las byung ba'i kha dog ser @181b po'i rin po che bsams la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pas ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar yi ge sv'a las byung ba'i kha dog ser @181b po'i rin po che bsams la /
translated: Thus, a practitioner of Ratnasa·πÉbhava imagines a yellow jewel arisen from the syllable sva in the heart of the awareness being,

analyzed: mdun du yang rin chen ye shes can ni bsgrub bya dbul po rin chen dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par bsams te /
translated: and also in front of himself, the jewel for those with jewel intuition, the person to be benefited, who is poor, in the center of a jeweled ma·πá·∏çala, that is, in the center of a moon ma·πá·∏çala.

analyzed: de'i sgo dgu la rin chen ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i ngo bo ste /

analyzed: de'i don ni 'od zer ser po dgu spros la dbul po'i sgo dgu la zhugs par bsams na rgyas pa'o //
translated: The meaning of that is as follows: Imagine that nine yellow light rays emanate and enter the nine orifices of the poor person, and that person becomes wealthy.

original: padmo ye shes can rnams kyi //
analyzed: padmo ye shes can rnams kyi //
translated: The lotus for those with lotus intuition,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

analyzed: padma'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar yi ge aa las byung ba'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po bsams la /

translated: Also in front, the lotus-holder, the one to be accomplished, such as a king, and so on, is imagined to be situated in the center of a lotus and moon ma·πá·∏çala.

analyzed: de'i sgo dgu la padma ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i ngo bo ste /

original: de'i don ni 'od zer dgu dmar po spros la /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'od zer dgu dmar po spros la /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows: Nine red light rays are emitted,

original: rgyal po la sogs pa'i sgo dgu la zhugs par bsams na de'i tshe dbang ngo//
analyzed: rgyal po la sogs pa'i sgo dgu la zhugs par bsams na de'i tshe dbang ngo//

original: ral gri ye shes can rnams kyi //
analyzed: ral gri ye shes can rnams kyi //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar kham las byung ba'i kha dog ljang gu rtse brgyad pa'i rdo rje rnal gri bsams la /
translated: The practitioner of Amoghasiddhi imagines an eight-spoked green sword arising from k·π£a·πÉ in the heart of the gnosis being.

analyzed: mdun du yang ral gri ye shes can ni bsgrub bya /

analyzed: dam tshig dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par bsams la /

original: de'i sgo dgu la ral gri ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: de'i sgo dgu la ral gri ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i ngo bo ste /

original: de'i don ni 'od zer dgu ljang gu spros la /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'od zer dgu ljang gu spros la /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows: Having emitted the nine green light rays,

analyzed: bsgrub bya'i sgo dgu la zhugs par bsgoms na de'i tshe 'gugs pa'o / dkyil 'khor kun kyi ngos rnams su //

translated: ‚ÄúOn all sides of the ma·πá·∏çala‚Äù and so forth.

analyzed: 'od zer lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par dgod par bya ba ni 'jug par bya'o /

translated: This teaches that if one emits the light rays by means of the five light ray divisions, the yogin will attain the powers of pacification and so forth, which is to say, the victim will be attained.

original: sngags rnams thams cad ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams te /
analyzed: sngags rnams thams cad ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams te /
translated: All mantras are the light rays of the wheel and so forth.

original: de dag spro ba ni rnam pa gnyis zhes pa ni kha 'am ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las spro ba ste /üîΩbrjod pa ni @182a * //
analyzed: de dag spro ba ni rnam pa gnyis zhes pa ni kha 'am ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las spro ba ste / brjod pa ni @182a * //
translated: The two kinds of emanations are emanations from the mouth and from all the pores of the skin.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
translated: The expressions are the utterances of the Bhagavat.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sgo nas spro ba bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sgo nas spro ba bshad pa'i phyir /

analyzed: sku gsum rdo rje bye brag gis // zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: By the distinctions of the three bodies and the vajras,

original: sku gsum ni chos kyi sku la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsum ni chos kyi sku la sogs pa'o //
translated: The three bodies are the Dharma Body, etc.

original: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so//
analyzed: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so//

original: de dag nyid bye brag spros pa gang las byung ba de ni /
analyzed: de dag nyid bye brag spros pa gang las byung ba de ni /

original: sku gsum rdo rje bye brag ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: sku gsum rdo rje bye brag ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //

original: 'di'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs te spro ba dang bsdu ba bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs te spro ba dang bsdu ba bya'o //
translated: One should emanate and gather, focusing on his samadhi.

original: ji ltar zhe na lus kyi ngo bo ni zhi ba'i snod kyi bsgrub bya la /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na lus kyi ngo bo ni zhi ba'i snod kyi bsgrub bya la /
translated: How? The essence of the body is the object of attainment of the vessel of peace.

original: sku ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis bsgrub bya de nyid kyi spyi bor thim zhing tshim pas spro ba byed na de'i tshe zhi ba'o //
analyzed: sku ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis bsgrub bya de nyid kyi spyi bor thim zhing tshim pas spro ba byed na de'i tshe zhi ba'o //
translated: The body is Vairocana, and if one performs the expansion of the object of attainment by dissolving into the head and satisfying, then at that time it is pacifying.

original: de bzhin du sems ni mngon spyod kyi gnas bsgrub bya la thugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni mi bskyod pa spyi bor thim zhing 'od du zhu ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du sems ni mngon spyod kyi gnas bsgrub bya la thugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni mi bskyod pa spyi bor thim zhing 'od du zhu ba ste /
translated: Similarly, the mind is the object of attainment of the fierce one, and the nature of the mind is Ak·π£obhya, who dissolves into the head and melts into light.

original: de'i tshe gsod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe gsod pa'o //
translated: At that time, it is killing.

original: ngag ni dbang du ma gyur pa'i bsgrub bya la gsung gi ngo bo snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyi bor thim zhing spro ba byed na de'i tshe dbang ngo //
analyzed: ngag ni dbang du ma gyur pa'i bsgrub bya la gsung gi ngo bo snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyi bor thim zhing spro ba byed na de'i tshe dbang ngo //
translated: The speech is the object of attainment who is not under control, and the nature of speech is AmitƒÅbha, who dissolves into the head and performs the expansion. At that time, it is controlling.

original: de bzhin du rgyas pa dang dgug pa dag la yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyas pa dang dgug pa dag la yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that in the same way, it is enriching and summoning.

original: de ltar mchod na zhes pa ni spro bas mchod pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub gnas su gyur pa ni thob par 'gyur te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar mchod na zhes pa ni spro bas mchod pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub gnas su gyur pa ni thob par 'gyur te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: If one worships in that way, the worship by means of the emanation is the attainment of the place of the powers of pacifying and so on.

original: dbye ba gzhan gyis zhi ba la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: dbye ba gzhan gyis zhi ba la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, having explained the powers of pacifying and so on by means of another classification,

original: dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo yis //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo yis //
translated: By the wheel of the great ma·πá·∏çala,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ni rang gi rig ma'i padma'o //
translated: The wheel of the great ma·πá·∏çala is one‚Äôs own awareness consort‚Äôs lotus.

original: de la rdo rje lnga rnams ni 'dod pa'i gdugs la sogs pa'i rtsa lnga bsgoms la /
analyzed: de la rdo rje lnga rnams ni 'dod pa'i gdugs la sogs pa'i rtsa lnga bsgoms la /
translated: There, one should meditate on the five vajras, the five nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the parasol of desire, and so on.

analyzed: rtsa dbus ma la rang gi gzugs ni rang gi bdag nyid bdag po ni mi bskyod par bsams te /
translated: One‚Äôs own form on the central nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ is one‚Äôs own nature, the lord Ak·π£obhya.

analyzed: dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag tu zhes pa ni rus sbal ma la sogs pa'i rtsa bzhi po la /
translated: The four ma·πá·∏çalas are the four nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the tortoise, and so on.

original: rang sngags rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs te /
analyzed: rang sngags rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs te /
translated: One‚Äôs own mantra is the form of VajradhƒÅtvƒ´≈õvarƒ´, and so on.

original: kha dog rnam pa bzhi ni dkar po la sogs pa'i sku mdog dang ldan par bsams la /
analyzed: kha dog rnam pa bzhi ni dkar po la sogs pa'i sku mdog dang ldan par bsams la /
translated: The four colors are the colors of the body, white, and so on.

original: de rnams kyi snying ga ni ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar sngags kyi don ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i bsgrub bya rnams bsgom pa ni zhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi snying ga ni ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar sngags kyi don ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i bsgrub bya rnams bsgom pa ni zhugs par bya'o //
translated: The object of the mantra in the heart of the gnosis being is the object of meditation, such as pacifying, and so on.

original: de lta bu'i bsam gtan ni ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje can ni sgrub pa pos rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'i las ni zhi ba la sogs @182b pa'i las byed pa ni rdzogs par byed pa'o /
analyzed: de lta bu'i bsam gtan ni ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje can ni sgrub pa pos rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'i las ni zhi ba la sogs @182b pa'i las byed pa ni rdzogs par byed pa'o /

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How so?

analyzed: sngags thams cad ni bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul la gnas pa la gsang ba ni sbas par bya'o //

analyzed: gzhan yang nang gi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir rab tu bzang po'o //

analyzed: gtan du bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir brtag pa'o //

analyzed: dbang gi las bya ba yin na khyad par du snang bas na rnam par snang mdzad ni nyi ma ste /

analyzed: de'i gnas ni de byung bas kha phye ba'i padma ste /

original: rdo rje thams cad ni sgrub pa po rnams te /

original: de dag gi gsang ba ni chos 'byung ste /
analyzed: de dag gi gsang ba ni chos 'byung ste /

original: de la sku gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
analyzed: de la sku gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /

analyzed: bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa yin la de rnams nyid rol mo ste spros ba dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pas mtshan pa ni 'byung ba ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //

analyzed: grong ngam yang na grong khyer ram zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúIn a village or a city,‚Äù and so on.

original: grong khyer ni rgyal po'i gnas dang / grong ni yul gyi phyogs gcig dang / ljongs ni grong gi tshogs su 'og nas bshad par gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin /
analyzed: grong khyer ni rgyal po'i gnas dang / grong ni yul gyi phyogs gcig dang / ljongs ni grong gi tshogs su 'og nas bshad par gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin /
translated: A city is a royal residence, a village is a part of a country, and a region is a collection of villages.

original: rab 'byor ba ni bya ba yin na de'i tshe nad thams cad spong bar byed pa'i zhi ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor ba ni bya ba yin na de'i tshe nad thams cad spong bar byed pa'i zhi ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one practices the samƒÅdhi that will be explained below, then at that time, the peace that abandons all illness will arise.

original: re zhig dang por grong la sogs pa las ji srid nam mkha'i bar du de'i tshad dang ldan pa'i yi ge gsum las byung ba dkar po de bzhin bshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtse lnga pa'i rdo rje chen po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par
analyzed: re zhig dang por grong la sogs pa las ji srid nam mkha'i bar du de'i tshad dang ldan pa'i yi ge gsum las byung ba dkar po de bzhin bshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtse lnga pa'i rdo rje chen po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par
translated: First, in a village and so on, up to the sky, the five-tined great vajra, the size of which is the size of the three seed syllables, blessed by the five tathƒÅgatas, is white and rests on a moon ma·πá·∏çala.

original: bsams la / rdo rje de nyid bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i tshogs dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu la gnas pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs bsregs par bsgoms la /
analyzed: bsams la / rdo rje de nyid bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i tshogs dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu la gnas pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs bsregs par bsgoms la /
translated: Having contemplated that, one should meditate on that vajra, which is like a mass of fire blazing at the end of an eon, with its light rays burning the hosts of obstructors dwelling in the ten directions.

original: 'od zer de rnams de nyid du nye bar bsdus nas de nyid du thim par bya ste /
analyzed: 'od zer de rnams de nyid du nye bar bsdus nas de nyid du thim par bya ste /

original: bgegs bskrad pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: bgegs bskrad pa'i cho ga'o //

original: de'i 'og tu 'o ma'i rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs spros la /üîΩrin chen yid bzhin nor bu gang la @187a * //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu 'o ma'i rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs spros la / rin chen yid bzhin nor bu gang la @187a * //
translated: Then, after that, one should emanate a mass of light rays like a milk ocean.

original: yod pa de ni rin chen yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste /
analyzed: yod pa de ni rin chen yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste /
translated: That which has a precious wish-fulfilling gem is a precious wish-fulfilling gem.

original: 'o ma'i rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs de dag gis /
analyzed: 'o ma'i rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs de dag gis /

original: chos kyi sprin ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams grong la sogs par gnas pa'i sems can de rnams la /
analyzed: chos kyi sprin ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams grong la sogs par gnas pa'i sems can de rnams la /

original: dbang bskur ba ni 'od zer 'bab par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni 'od zer 'bab par bya'o //

analyzed: de'i tshe de ma thag tu char 'bebs pa ste zhi ba'i rtags so //

original: rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni //
analyzed: rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni //
translated: By this vajra concentration,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis dgang dkar ba ni lus phra ba'i nad pa rnams rab tu 'gengs pa ni tshim par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis dgang dkar ba ni lus phra ba'i nad pa rnams rab tu 'gengs pa ni tshim par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this stable concentration, the difficult to fill are filled, the sick are satisfied.üîΩThose sick ones, like a wish-fulfilling gem, become radiant, glorious, and prosperous.

original: nad pa de rnams yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni de dang 'dra ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa dang / dpal ldan ni rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa'i rdo rje sbyin pa gtong bas sgom byed pa ni grags pa yang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nad pa de rnams yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni de dang 'dra ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa dang / dpal ldan ni rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa'i rdo rje sbyin pa gtong bas sgom byed pa ni grags pa yang thob par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de'i rjes la sa nyid du sangs rgyas sprin rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs can dang / chos chen ni gsung gi rigs can dang / rdo rje sems dpa' ni thugs kyi rigs can rnams te /
translated: After that, on the very ground, the cloud of Buddhas, the family of Vairocana, the great Dharma, the family of speech, and Vajrasattva, the family of mind,

analyzed: de dag spros na bskal ba gsum gyi bar du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang /

analyzed: byin gyis rlob pa ni gnas par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: skyon med pa ni nad med par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: sbas pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //

analyzed: nad thams cad ni tsha ba'i nad la sogs pa ste /

original: de rnams med par byed pa ni zhi ba ste /

original: de nyid rdo rje ni ji srid bskal pa'i bar du gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje ni ji srid bskal pa'i bar du gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin du bshad pa'o //

analyzed: gzhan yang gnas bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir phur bu 'debs pa bshad par bya ste /

analyzed: lha khang la sogs pas mnyam par gzhag pa ni ting nge 'dzin rnal 'byor pas brtsams na /

analyzed: de'i tshe bsam gtan sbyor ba de nyid kyis /

analyzed: sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni gnas de byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro /

original: de nyid bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid bshad par bya ste /

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che //
translated: The great king of vajra nectar

original: @187b zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: @187b zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste /
translated: The great king of vajra nectar is Am·πõtaku·πá·∏çali.

original: de nyid rdo rje phur bu stod ni de'i rnam pa dang / smad ni rdo rje rtse'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje phur bu stod ni de'i rnam pa dang / smad ni rdo rje rtse'i rnam pa ste /
translated: He himself is the vajra stake, the upper part of which is in the form of him, and the lower part in the form of a vajra point.

original: de nyid bsgoms la phyogs skyong rnams kyi spyi bor /
analyzed: de nyid bsgoms la phyogs skyong rnams kyi spyi bor /
translated: Meditating on just that, on the crowns of the direction protectors,

analyzed: me stag 'bar ba ni 'bar ba'i me stag dang ldan par btab cing ting nge 'dzin bya ste /

analyzed: dkyil 'khor brtsams pa la yang chog de nyid bya'o //
translated: That very rite should be performed for the commencement of the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: 'gro ba'i tsher ma ni brgya byin la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i tsher ma ni brgya byin la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: de rnams 'dul ba ni khro bo'i rgyal po rnams so //

original: zhi ba ni de rnams kyis byas pa'i gnas bsrung ba ste /
analyzed: zhi ba ni de rnams kyis byas pa'i gnas bsrung ba ste /

analyzed: de nyid mi g-yo ba'i phyir rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin du bshad pa ste /

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //

analyzed: zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: khams gsum ni lus ngag yid kyi rang bzhin rtsa bdun khri nyis stong dang ldan pa'i lus te /
analyzed: khams gsum ni lus ngag yid kyi rang bzhin rtsa bdun khri nyis stong dang ldan pa'i lus te /

analyzed: de'i dbyings ni smin ma'i bar du zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor ni /

analyzed: de'i 'og tu nad pa de nyid rdo rje 'dra ba ni brtan pa'i lus dang 'dra ba dang / dpal ldan ni skad cig ma gcig gis nad med par 'gyur ro //
translated: After that, that patient himself becomes like a firm body, like a vajra, and glorious, free from disease in an instant.

original: sangs rgyas dam tshig ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dam tshig ni rnam par snang mdzad de /

analyzed: de'i bkod pa ni de'i 'khor gyis dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin du bshad pa'o // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor @188a * //
translated: Its array is the samƒÅdhi empowerment of its retinue, which is explained as such.

original: dbus su ni //
analyzed: dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of the moon ma·πá·∏çala,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: zla ba dang zla ba ni zla ba ste gsang ba'i gnas dang lkog ma dag go //
analyzed: zla ba dang zla ba ni zla ba ste gsang ba'i gnas dang lkog ma dag go //
translated: The moon and the moon are the moon, which is the secret place and the throat.

original: de dag gi dbus su gnas pa'i gsang chen ni yi ge lam las byung ba gru bzhi pa dang / dkyil 'khor dam pa ni 'od 'bar ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa bsgoms la /
analyzed: de dag gi dbus su gnas pa'i gsang chen ni yi ge lam las byung ba gru bzhi pa dang / dkyil 'khor dam pa ni 'od 'bar ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa bsgoms la /
translated: The great secret that exists in the center of those is the square that arises from the syllable ma·πÉ, and the excellent ma·πá·∏çala is the blazing fire ma·πá·∏çala that arises from the syllable ra·πÉ.üîΩHaving meditated on those, in the center of those, one should meditate on Ratnasa·πÉbhava and Dharmadhara, which is AmitƒÅbha.

original: de dag gi dkyil du rin chen 'byung ldan dang / chos 'dzin pa ni snang ba mtha' yas bsgom zhing de dag gi snying ga ni ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar 'dod pa ni bsgrub bya ste de bzhag la /
analyzed: de dag gi dkyil du rin chen 'byung ldan dang / chos 'dzin pa ni snang ba mtha' yas bsgom zhing de dag gi snying ga ni ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar 'dod pa ni bsgrub bya ste de bzhag la /

original: snga ma bzhin du nam mkha'i dbyings kyang nyams dga' ba ni m'a ma k'i gtso bor gyur pa'i rin chen rigs can dang / dkar mo ni padma'i rigs can rnams kyis bsams shing bsdus la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du nam mkha'i dbyings kyang nyams dga' ba ni m'a ma k'i gtso bor gyur pa'i rin chen rigs can dang / dkar mo ni padma'i rigs can rnams kyis bsams shing bsdus la /
translated: As before, the sky is delightful, imagined and gathered by the jewel family, with MƒÅmakƒ´ as the chief, and by the lotus family, with PƒÅ·πá·∏çaravƒÅsinƒ´.

original: rin chen 'od dang yid bzhin nor bu ni padma r'a ga ste /
analyzed: rin chen 'od dang yid bzhin nor bu ni padma r'a ga ste /
translated: Jewel light and wish-fulfilling gem are padmarƒÅga.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i de rnams kyis 'dod pa ni bsgrub bya'i lus ngag yid tshim par byas la slar yang phyi rol du spros te /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i de rnams kyis 'dod pa ni bsgrub bya'i lus ngag yid tshim par byas la slar yang phyi rol du spros te /
translated: Those who are like that should satisfy the body, speech, and mind of the one to be satisfied, and again emanate externally.

analyzed: rin chen ni rin po che'i rigs dang / sprin ni padma'i rigs te de rnams /
translated: The jewel is the jewel family, and the cloud is the lotus family.

analyzed: brtul zhugs can ni rnal 'byor pas phyi rol du spros te /
translated: The practitioner should emanate those externally.

analyzed: chos ni padma'i rigs can dang / sprin ni rin chen gyi rigs rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du dbang bskur na rgyas pa dang dbang gi las 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The Dharma is the lotus family, and the cloud is the jewel family. If they confer empowerment as before, the activities of increase and power will be accomplished.

original: rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni //
analyzed: rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni //
translated: By this vajra contemplation,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: rdo rje bsam gtan ni 'das ma thag tu bshad pa bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis /

analyzed: dgang dka' ni skyes bu dbul po khengs pa ni rgyas par bya'o //
translated: Difficult to fill is the inflated poor person.

original: de bzhin du padma'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang bsgrub bya yid bzhin nor bus ni bsgrub pa po la re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa dang / dpal ni phun sum tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du padma'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang bsgrub bya yid bzhin nor bus ni bsgrub pa po la re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa dang / dpal ni phun sum tshogs pa ste /

analyzed: de btang pas na dpal ldan no //

original: chos ni snang ba mtha' yas dang / dam tshig ni rin chen 'byung ldan ste /
analyzed: chos ni snang ba mtha' yas dang / dam tshig ni rin chen 'byung ldan ste /

original: de dag gi sprin ni rigs can rnams te /

analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i lha mo spyan gyis 'khyud par bsgoms la / de'i padma'i lte ba'i dbus su ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis bsgrub bya ba kug cing bzhag la snying ga'i padmar kha dog dkar po'i rig sngags 'di bkod la rtsa dbus ma'i lam nas bdud rtsir zhu ba'i ngo bos rdo rje
translated: embraced by a goddess similar to him.üîΩIn the center of the hub of his lotus, the light rays from the seed syllable in the heart of the awareness being invite the one to be healed, and he is placed there.üîΩIn the heart lotus, arrange this awareness mantra, which is white in color.

original: dar padma'i rtse mer phyin la /
analyzed: dar padma'i rtse mer phyin la /
translated: From the path of the central channel, the essence of the elixir arrives at the tip of the lotus.

original: che ge mo 'di la sh'antim ku ru hr'i: zhes bya ba brjod cing yang @193b yum gnyis kas kyang de'i spyi bor /
analyzed: che ge mo 'di la sh'antim ku ru hr'i: zhes bya ba brjod cing yang @193b yum gnyis kas kyang de'i spyi bor /
translated: and To such and such a one, give happiness!üîΩ

original: byang chub kyi sems dkar pos dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dkar pos dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Saying To so-and-so, ≈öƒÅntikurva Hri, both mothers should confer empowerment on his head with white bodhicitta.

original: de'i rjes de nyid las phyi rol du spros te sngags de nyid kyis sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs na sos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rjes de nyid las phyi rol du spros te sngags de nyid kyis sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs na sos par 'gyur ro //
translated: After that, having emanated from that very [place], if one blesses body, speech, and mind with that very mantra, [the patient] will recover.

original: de nas tsandan dkar pos ri mo med pa'i grog la rtsibs bcu pa'i 'khor lo bris te /
analyzed: de nas tsandan dkar pos ri mo med pa'i grog la rtsibs bcu pa'i 'khor lo bris te /
translated: Then, on a white ant-hill free of cracks, one should draw a ten-spoked wheel with white sandalwood.

original: dbus su aom dang rtsibs gzhan rnams la yi ge gnyis bkod la /
analyzed: dbus su aom dang rtsibs gzhan rnams la yi ge gnyis bkod la /
translated: In the center, one should place O·πÉ, and on the other spokes, the two syllables.

original: sgyu ma'i sa bon gyis 'khor lo'i mthar bskor zhing lcags gsum gyis bskor bar byas te /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i sa bon gyis 'khor lo'i mthar bskor zhing lcags gsum gyis bskor bar byas te /
translated: Surrounding the wheel with the seed syllables of illusion, one should surround it with the three metals.

original: skud pa dkar pos bcings shing nad pa de'i g-yas pa'i dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: skud pa dkar pos bcings shing nad pa de'i g-yas pa'i dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Binding it with a white thread, one should bind it to the right arm of the patient.

original: de nas rims la sogs pa slar mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de nas rims la sogs pa slar mi 'byung ngo //
translated: Then, fever and so forth will not return.

original: de bzhin du de ma thag tu shi ba'i skyes pa rnyed la /
analyzed: de bzhin du de ma thag tu shi ba'i skyes pa rnyed la /
translated: Similarly, having obtained a corpse that has just died,

original: rang gi bdag nyid snga ma bzhin du bsgoms shing shi ba de tsandan dkar po 'dres pa'i chus bkrus la /
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid snga ma bzhin du bsgoms shing shi ba de tsandan dkar po 'dres pa'i chus bkrus la /
translated: One should meditate on one's own nature as before. Having washed the corpse with water mixed with white sandalwood,

original: de srid pa bar ma dor yang yi ge gsum gyi rang bzhin nam mkha' las bkug cing lha mo'i padma'i lte ba'i nang du zhugs la /
analyzed: de srid pa bar ma dor yang yi ge gsum gyi rang bzhin nam mkha' las bkug cing lha mo'i padma'i lte ba'i nang du zhugs la /
translated: one should summon the intermediate existence with the nature of the three syllables from space and cause it to enter the interior of the lotus of the goddess.

original: snga ma bzhin du sngags kyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang bskur bas thim par byas shing phyi rol du spros te /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du sngags kyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang bskur bas thim par byas shing phyi rol du spros te /
translated: As before, one should cause it to dissolve through the consecration of bodhicitta arisen from the transformation of the mantra syllables and emanate externally.

original: ro'i lus kyi snying gar zhugs shing mdo gser po rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyis bskor zhing sngags de nyid kyis spyi bo la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs na shi ba de slong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ro'i lus kyi snying gar zhugs shing mdo gser po rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyis bskor zhing sngags de nyid kyis spyi bo la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs na shi ba de slong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having caused it to enter the heart of the corpse's body, and having consecrated the head, etc., with that mantra, the corpse will rise up, surrounded by the great mandala marked with a golden vajra.

original: de nas snga ma bzhin du srung ba'i 'khor lo yang bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du srung ba'i 'khor lo yang bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then, as before, one should bind the protection wheel.

original: las gzhan rnams byed par 'od dan de'i tshe sngags kyi yi ge dang mchod pa'i rdzas rnams dmar po la sogs pa'i kha dog tu bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: las gzhan rnams byed par 'od dan de'i tshe sngags kyi yi ge dang mchod pa'i rdzas rnams dmar po la sogs pa'i kha dog tu bsgom par bya'o //
translated: If one is performing other rites, then at that time one should meditate on the mantra syllables and the offering substances as red and so forth.

original: phreng ba'i dbye ba ni las tshogs kyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: phreng ba'i dbye ba ni las tshogs kyi dbye bas so //
translated: The classification of the rosary is by the classification of the rites.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:üîΩCrystal, conch, and pearl,

original: shel dang dung dang mu tig dang // de bzhin dkar po'i khams rang bzhin //üîΩzhi ba'i las la blo ldan pas //
analyzed: shel dang dung dang mu tig dang // de bzhin dkar po'i khams rang bzhin // zhi ba'i las la blo ldan pas //
translated: and likewise the nature of white elements,üîΩthe wise one should take

original: bya ba grub phyir blang bar bya //
analyzed: bya ba grub phyir blang bar bya //
translated: for the sake of accomplishing the rite of pacification.

original: dngul dang gser dang zangs ma ni //
analyzed: dngul dang gser dang zangs ma ni //
translated: Silver, gold, and copper

original: rgyas pa la ni rgyal bas gsungs //
analyzed: rgyas pa la ni rgyal bas gsungs //
translated: are taught by the Victor for the rite of enrichment.

original: gur ku ma gla rtsi bzhi mnyam mo //
analyzed: gur ku ma gla rtsi bzhi mnyam mo //
translated: Gurkum, musk, and the four equal parts

original: dbang gi las la shes par bya //
analyzed: dbang gi las la shes par bya //
translated: should be known for the rite of power.

original: dgug pa la ni ru dr'a ksha //
analyzed: dgug pa la ni ru dr'a ksha //
translated: For summoning, there is rudraksha;

original: sdang ba la sogs glang po yin //
analyzed: sdang ba la sogs glang po yin //
translated: for enraging, and so forth, there is elephant.

original: rtsa ba'i sngags rnams bzlas pa la //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags rnams bzlas pa la //
translated: For the recitation of the root mantras,

original: mi rus rang bzhin brjod pa yin //
analyzed: mi rus rang bzhin brjod pa yin //
translated: it is said to be made of human bone.

original: phrin las thams cad rab grub phyir //
analyzed: phrin las thams cad rab grub phyir //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing all activities,

original: bo de tse ni 'dod pa yin //üîΩzhes @194a * //
analyzed: bo de tse ni 'dod pa yin //üîΩzhes @194a * //
translated: it is desired to be made of bodices.

original: gsungs so ; / lag pa la dgod pa ni za ba'i dus bzhin du rjes su dran par bya ste /
analyzed: gsungs so ; / lag pa la dgod pa ni za ba'i dus bzhin du rjes su dran par bya ste /
translated: The placement in the hand is to be remembered as at the time of eating.

original: de yang sngar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de yang sngar bshad pa'o //
translated: And that is as previously explained.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the creation stage.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: sku gsum gyi dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
analyzed: sku gsum gyi dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
translated: The commitment of the three bodies is the Tathagatas.

original: de dag gi khro bo nye bar bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: de dag gi khro bo nye bar bsdu ba ste /
translated: Their wrath is the gathering.

original: de nyid gtso bor gyur pa'i rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: de nyid gtso bor gyur pa'i rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: That itself is the chief vajra, which is Great Vajradhara.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa ni sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten te /
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa ni sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten te /
translated: Entity and non-entity are the sentient beings and the world vessel.

original: de dag gi dam tshig ni gcig tu gyur pa ste chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: de dag gi dam tshig ni gcig tu gyur pa ste chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
translated: Their commitment is the one-gone-thus, which is the exalted wisdom of the ultimate realm.

original: de'i rang bzhin gyi mi bskyod pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi mi bskyod pa ste /
translated: The nature of that is Akshobhya.

original: de nyid kyi rdo rje ni m'a ma k'i ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi rdo rje ni m'a ma k'i ste /
translated: That vajra is Mamaki.

original: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'dzin thams cad ni mi bskyod pa ste /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'dzin thams cad ni mi bskyod pa ste /
translated: Having entered into equipoise on the samadhi called that, all vajra holders are Akshobhya.

original: de nyid btsun mo'i mchog ni m'a ma k'i ste /
analyzed: de nyid btsun mo'i mchog ni m'a ma k'i ste /
translated: That itself is the supreme queen, Mamaki.

original: de nye bar bstan pas rig sngags kyi de bzhin du bshad pa ste /
analyzed: de nye bar bstan pas rig sngags kyi de bzhin du bshad pa ste /
translated: By teaching that, the mantra is explained as it is.

original: de nyid nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
translated: That itself is the body of reality, and so on, as before.

original: aom ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o ;
analyzed: aom ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o ;
translated: Om is Great Vajradhara.

original: / sham ni dge legs te de byed pas na sham ka ri'o //
analyzed: / sham ni dge legs te de byed pas na sham ka ri'o //
translated: Sham is auspiciousness, and since he creates that, he is Shamkari.

original: sh'antim ni 'jigs ba zhi ba ste de byed pas na sh'antim ka ri'o //
analyzed: sh'antim ni 'jigs ba zhi ba ste de byed pas na sh'antim ka ri'o //
translated: Santim is the pacification of fear, and since he creates that, he is SantimkarI.

original: ghu ti ni zhes pa ni gdug pa 'dul bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: ghu ti ni zhes pa ni gdug pa 'dul bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: Ghat means he acts to subdue the wicked.

original: gdul bas kyang gal te dbang du ma gyur na de'i tshe ghu ta yam zhes pa ni gdug pa rnams gsod par mdzad pa'o//
analyzed: gdul bas kyang gal te dbang du ma gyur na de'i tshe ghu ta yam zhes pa ni gdug pa rnams gsod par mdzad pa'o//
translated: If, by subduing them, they are not brought under control, then at that time, ghatayam means he acts to kill the wicked.

original: tshig gnyis ni zlos pa'o //
analyzed: tshig gnyis ni zlos pa'o //
translated: The two words are repeated.

original: sv'a h'a'i sgras ni gdul ba dang gsod pa rnams slar yang slong ba'i phyir zhi ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: sv'a h'a'i sgras ni gdul ba dang gsod pa rnams slar yang slong ba'i phyir zhi ba'i don du'o //
translated: The word svaha means for the sake of peace, in order to bring back to life those who have been subdued and killed.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngags 'di nyid gsungs pa tsam gyis sku gsum dbyer med rdo rje can ni lus ngag yid la 'jigs par byed pa'i dgra bo rnams dang / rdo rje bzhin du shin tu rno ba'i srin po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngags 'di nyid gsungs pa tsam gyis sku gsum dbyer med rdo rje can ni lus ngag yid la 'jigs par byed pa'i dgra bo rnams dang / rdo rje bzhin du shin tu rno ba'i srin po la sogs pa'o //
translated: Just by the utterance of this mantra, the one with the indivisible three vajras, the enemies who terrify body, speech, and mind, and the rakshasas, etc., who are very sharp like a vajra,

original: mnyes pa'i spyan ni gdangs nas su //
analyzed: mnyes pa'i spyan ni gdangs nas su //
translated: open their pleasing eyes.

original: zhes pa ni de'i 'jigs pa ldog pas dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa po rnams kyi /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de'i 'jigs pa ldog pas dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa po rnams kyi /
translated: This is the practitioner who has a delighted mind due to the cessation of their fear.

original: rdo rje thugs ni m'a ma k'i dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i thugs rdo rje dang / rin chen 'byung ldan rjes su dran pa ni sgom pas so //
analyzed: rdo rje thugs ni m'a ma k'i dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i thugs rdo rje dang / rin chen 'byung ldan rjes su dran pa ni sgom pas so //
translated: The vajra mind is the mind vajra of union with Mamaki, and the recollection of Ratnasa·πÉbhava is through meditation.

original: rig sngags 'di ro langs la sogs pa'i 'jigs pas non pa rnams kyi /
analyzed: rig sngags 'di ro langs la sogs pa'i 'jigs pas non pa rnams kyi /
translated: This knowledge mantra is for those oppressed by the fear of zombies, etc.

original: rdo rje bsrung ba'i sbyor ba la zhes pa ni de rnams kyis dpung pa la bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bris nas rtag tu zhes pa ni dus thams cad du las rnams ni bgegs 'jig pa'i las @194b rnams sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: rdo rje bsrung ba'i sbyor ba la zhes pa ni de rnams kyis dpung pa la bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bris nas rtag tu zhes pa ni dus thams cad du las rnams ni bgegs 'jig pa'i las @194b rnams sgrub par byed do //
translated: The phrase the application of Vajravarada means that one draws the protection wheel on one's shoulder. Always means at all times. The activities are the activities of destroying obstructors.

original: rdo rje chen po ni thog bzhin du rnam par 'joms par byed pa'i sha za la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po ni thog bzhin du rnam par 'joms par byed pa'i sha za la sogs pa ste /
translated: The great vajra is the flesh-eating pi≈õƒÅca, etc., who destroy like lightning.

original: de rnams kyi 'jigs pas nyen pa la stobs byed pa de ldog pas rang gi nus pa skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'jigs pas nyen pa la stobs byed pa de ldog pas rang gi nus pa skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: The fear of them is the danger. The power is the protection. The reversal is the production of one's own ability.

original: 'dir ni sbyor ba 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni sbyor ba 'di yin te /
translated: Here is the application.

original: mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pa dag gi rang gi rig ma'i padma'i nang du srin po sogs pas non pa'i skyes bu la sogs pa zhugs te /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pa dag gi rang gi rig ma'i padma'i nang du srin po sogs pas non pa'i skyes bu la sogs pa zhugs te /
translated: For those who are yogins of Ak·π£obhya and Ratnasa·πÉbhava, a person, etc., oppressed by a rƒÅk·π£asa, etc., enters the lotus of one's knowledge consort.

original: snga ma bzhin du sngags kyang snying gar bzhag la de nyid kyang rtsa dbu ma'i lam nas zhu ste /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du sngags kyang snying gar bzhag la de nyid kyang rtsa dbu ma'i lam nas zhu ste /
translated: As before, the mantra is also placed at the heart, and it melts through the path of the central channel.

original: gnyis kas kyang 'od zer nag po lcags kyu dang 'dra ste de nyid bsgrub bya'i spyi bor phab la de nyid snying gar gnas pa'i kha dog nag po sha za la sogs pa de'i kha'i sgo nas byung bar byas la phyi rol du spros te snga ma bzhin
analyzed: gnyis kas kyang 'od zer nag po lcags kyu dang 'dra ste de nyid bsgrub bya'i spyi bor phab la de nyid snying gar gnas pa'i kha dog nag po sha za la sogs pa de'i kha'i sgo nas byung bar byas la phyi rol du spros te snga ma bzhin
translated: Both of them emit black light rays like hooks, which descend on the crown of the head of the one to be liberated, and that very [light] enters the mouth of the black-colored one, such as a flesh-eating [spirit], and so forth, who resides in the heart.

original: du byin gyis brlabs na nad pa de skyon dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: du byin gyis brlabs na nad pa de skyon dang bral ba'o //
translated: Having emanated externally, as before, if one blesses [the patient], that patient will be free from faults.üîΩThen, if one binds the protection wheel, [the patient] will be cured.

original: de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bcings na sos par 'gyur te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //üîΩde nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod chags chen po ni snang ba mtha' yas te /üîΩde nyid kyi dam tshig ni snyoms par zhugs pa'i phyir /

translated: This is the creation stage.

original: de dang tha mi dad pa'i rig sngags kyang de bzhin du bshad pa ste /
analyzed: de dang tha mi dad pa'i rig sngags kyang de bzhin du bshad pa ste /
translated: The knowledge mantra that is not different from that is explained in the same way.

original: de nyid nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
translated: That very reality is the body, and so on, as before.

original: aom ni bkra shis pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: aom ni bkra shis pa'i don du'o //
translated: Om is for the meaning of auspiciousness.

original: ka te zhes pa ni 'tsho bar dka' ba la'o //
analyzed: ka te zhes pa ni 'tsho bar dka' ba la'o //
translated: Kata means difficult to live.

original: ni ka te zhes pa ni dbul po rnams la mngon par phyogs pa'o //
analyzed: ni ka te zhes pa ni dbul po rnams la mngon par phyogs pa'o //
translated: Nika means inclined toward the poor.

original: ka ni bde ba ste de nyid dang ka sbyar bas ka ta ka ste aa dha ni nor thob tu 'dzud pa'o //
analyzed: ka ni bde ba ste de nyid dang ka sbyar bas ka ta ka ste aa dha ni nor thob tu 'dzud pa'o //
translated: Ka is bliss. Since that is combined with ka, kata means ka, which is to bring about the attainment of wealth.

original: ka ta dang ni ka yang yin pas ka ta ka ste phyi ma'i aa mi mngon par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ka ta dang ni ka yang yin pas ka ta ka ste phyi ma'i aa mi mngon par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it is also kata and ka, kata becomes ka, with the following a not pronounced.

original: wi ka te zhes pa ni khyad par du sdug bsngal dang ldan pa rnams la /
analyzed: wi ka te zhes pa ni khyad par du sdug bsngal dang ldan pa rnams la /
translated: Vikata means those who are especially suffering.

original: ka ro ta ni mgo bo bzhin du gtso bo sbyin par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ka ro ta ni mgo bo bzhin du gtso bo sbyin par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Karota means to give as the chief thing, as if it were one's head.

original: b'irya ni brtson 'grus gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: b'irya ni brtson 'grus gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin no //

analyzed: gser gyi rna cha g-yo ba ni @203b rgyan dang bcas pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo dgug cing gnyer bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: // de'i rjes la 'dod chags kyis gdungs pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo des sgrub pa po la 'khyud par byed do //
translated: After that, the vidyƒÅdhara maiden, tormented by passion, will embrace the practitioner.üîΩNow, in order to explain the special recitation of the mantras explained previously,

analyzed: de ni sngar bshad pa'i sngags rnams kyi bzlas pa'i khyad par bshad par bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: 'gog pa'i rdo rje rgyal po ni //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: 'gog pa rdo rje ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'od gsal ba ste /

translated: The transformation into that is the entry, the supreme is the excellent, and the beautiful is the nature of the entry and so forth.

analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni yi ge gsum las byung ba'i bzlas pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa ste /

analyzed: ma ning gi bzlas pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: which is the nature of the neuter repetition.

analyzed: de ma thag tu ni de'i sgo nas skad cig ma gcig gis sngar bshad pa'i de rnams thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur te /

analyzed: de kho na nyid la zhugs pas thams cad dka' ba ma yin pa 'grub pa'i phyir te /

original: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //

analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang na thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang khro bo rnams la 'bum bzlas pas /

analyzed: dgon pa chen po la sogs par gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas sngar bshad pa'i las rnams thams cad ni zhi ba la sogs par 'grub par byed pa'o //
translated: the yogi who resides in a great forest and so forth will accomplish all the activities explained above, such as pacifying and so forth.

original: de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyang gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzlas na /
analyzed: de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyang gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzlas na /
translated: There, if one recites the mantra of any of the Tathagatas and so forth,

original: de'i tshe lha de nyid kyang yid kyis bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe lha de nyid kyang yid kyis bsgom par bya ste /
translated: at that time one should also visualize that deity.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the creation stage.

original: mngon spyod kyi yul bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: mngon spyod kyi yul bshad par bya ste /
translated: The object of the rite of assault should be explained.

original: rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The one who reviles the Vajra Master and so forth.

original: rdo rje slob dpon smod pa ni bla ma la sun 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon smod pa ni bla ma la sun 'byin pa'o //
translated: Reviling the Vajra Master means to offend the guru.

original: theg pa chen po smod pa ni gcer bu la sogs pa mu stegs pa rnams te /
analyzed: theg pa chen po smod pa ni gcer bu la sogs pa mu stegs pa rnams te /
translated: The one who reviles the Mahayana is the tirthikas such as the Nirgranthas, and so forth.

original: de dag thams cad nan tan @204a * //
analyzed: de dag thams cad nan tan @204a * //
translated: All of them should be killed.

original: du gsad par bya'o //
analyzed: du gsad par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúI will kill them.‚Äù

original: gal te las byed par mi 'dod na de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te las byed par mi 'dod na de'i tshe /
translated: If he does not wish to perform the rite,

original: gnas nas spro ba ni bskrad par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas nas spro ba ni bskrad par bya'o //
translated: then he should be expelled from the monastery.

original: las 'di nyid kyis snga ma bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon la sogs pa smod par byed pa rnams la byang chub mchog ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i zhing la skye ba bstan to //
analyzed: las 'di nyid kyis snga ma bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon la sogs pa smod par byed pa rnams la byang chub mchog ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i zhing la skye ba bstan to //
translated: By this very rite, as before, those who revile the vajra master and so forth are shown to be born in the realm of Akshobhya and so forth, the supreme enlightenment.

original: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur te /
translated: In the same way, I will also attain the power of mantra.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the creation stage.

original: yang rdo rje slob dpon ni 'khor ba'i spyod pa la 'jug par byed pa'i nyon mongs kyi yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: yang rdo rje slob dpon ni 'khor ba'i spyod pa la 'jug par byed pa'i nyon mongs kyi yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Moreover, the vajra master is the afflicted mind, the mental consciousness, and the consciousness of the ground of all, which cause one to engage in the conduct of samsara.

original: smod pa ni de dang 'brel pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin rnams so //
analyzed: smod pa ni de dang 'brel pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin rnams so //
translated: Reviling is the nature of those that are related to and possessed of that.

original: chen po ni yul lnga ste /
analyzed: chen po ni yul lnga ste /
translated: The great ones are the five objects.

original: de rnams la 'gro bas na theg pa chen po ste dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams la 'gro bas na theg pa chen po ste dbang po rnams so //
translated: Since they go to those, the great vehicle is the sense organs.

original: de rnams kyi mchog ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi mchog ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams te /
translated: The best of them are the eye consciousnesses, etc.

original: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //

original: smod pa ni de'i rang bzhin rnams te /
analyzed: smod pa ni de'i rang bzhin rnams te /

original: de dag thams cad bsad pa ni 'od gsal ba la zhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad bsad pa ni 'od gsal ba la zhugs par bya'o //
translated: All of them are killed, i.e., brought into clear light.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /

original: nan tan du zhes pa ni snang pa la sogs pa'i rim pas so //

original: de yang shin tu ngo mtshar ba'o //

analyzed: de'i phyir le'u bco lnga pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

original: rdo rje ni 'od gsal ba ste /

analyzed: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
