original: de'i bdag ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa dang / sa bcu ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i bdag ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa dang / sa bcu ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: His self is the attainment of the wisdom of discernment, and the ten stages are the Joyous and so on.

original: de rnams la yang gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams la yang gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: He abides in those.

original: gsung gi dam tshig ni snga tshogs pa'i bstan bcos sprul pa dang / 'dzin pa ni lan cig gis bstan bcos gzung ba'o //
analyzed: gsung gi dam tshig ni snga tshogs pa'i bstan bcos sprul pa dang / 'dzin pa ni lan cig gis bstan bcos gzung ba'o //
translated: The pledge of speech is the emanation and retention of the treatise in an instant.

original: rgyal po ni smra ba'i seng ge'i nang nas rgyal po'o //
analyzed: rgyal po ni smra ba'i seng ge'i nang nas rgyal po'o //
translated: The king is the king among the lions of speech.

original: kun ni gcer bu pa dang / grangs can pa dang / rig pa pa dang / khyad par ba dang / dpyod pa pa la sogs pa rnams kyi mchog ni gtso bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: kun ni gcer bu pa dang / grangs can pa dang / rig pa pa dang / khyad par ba dang / dpyod pa pa la sogs pa rnams kyi mchog ni gtso bor gyur pa'o //
translated: The best means the most excellent.

original: dam pa ni bud med dam rgyal po'i bud med rnams te /
analyzed: dam pa ni bud med dam rgyal po'i bud med rnams te /
translated: The supreme means women or the king‚Äôs women,

original: de rnams la shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de rnams la shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i phyir /
translated: because they are extremely attractive.

original: dbang phyug ni bdag po nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: dbang phyug ni bdag po nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: The powerful means one becomes a master.

original: dag gi de nyid dang 'dod pa'i de nyid dang / spros pa med pa'i de dag ste /
analyzed: dag gi de nyid dang 'dod pa'i de nyid dang / spros pa med pa'i de dag ste /
translated: The three realities are the reality of purity, the reality of desire, and the reality of nonconceptuality.

original: de kho na nyid gsum thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa tshig gi don to //
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa tshig gi don to //
translated: One will attain the three realities.

original: rin chen dang las kyi rnal 'byor pa dag zhe sdang gi rigs kyi nang du bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: rin chen dang las kyi rnal 'byor pa dag zhe sdang gi rigs kyi nang du bsdu ba ste /
translated: The jewel and action yogins are included in the family of anger.

original: de dag gis snga ma bzhin du sme sha can gyi bu mo @209a * //üîΩbsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: de dag gis snga ma bzhin du sme sha can gyi bu mo @209a * // bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: They should accomplish the daughter of an outcaste woman, as before.

original: rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu rnams so //
analyzed: rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu rnams so //
translated: The reality of purity is the reality of the nature, cause, action, and result.

original: da ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pa'i bsgrub ba bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pa'i bsgrub ba bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to explain the practice of the yogin of Great Vajradhara,

original: bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /üîΩbram ze la sogs pa bzhi po las gang yang rung ba thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir bu mo rnyed nas snga ma bzhin du rdo rje chos dag ni /
analyzed: bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / bram ze la sogs pa bzhi po las gang yang rung ba thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir bu mo rnyed nas snga ma bzhin du rdo rje chos dag ni /
translated: he says, ‚Äúthe brahmin, the k·π£atriya, the vai≈õya, and the ≈õ≈´dra,‚Äù and so on.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pas bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pas bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Having obtained a girl of any of the four castes, brahmin and so on, because he has power over all, the yogin of Great Vajradhara should practice the Vajra Dharma, as before.

original: sgrub pa de lta bu gsang ba'i tshul 'di sngags kyi theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog ni bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes ston to //
analyzed: sgrub pa de lta bu gsang ba'i tshul 'di sngags kyi theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog ni bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes ston to //
translated: This practice is the supreme way of the Mantra Vehicle, the way of the secret, because it is primarily the conferral of the fourth empowerment.

original: man ngag bzhi pa de nyid bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: man ngag bzhi pa de nyid bshad par bya ste /
translated: That fourth esoteric instruction should be explained.

original: rdo rje nyi ma nub nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma nub nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen the Vajra Sun has set,‚Äù and so on.

original: nub pa ni dus mtshams kyi skad cig ma la rdo rje nyi ma ni nyi ma ma nub pa'i dus su bla ma la mchod pa chen po byas te /
analyzed: nub pa ni dus mtshams kyi skad cig ma la rdo rje nyi ma ni nyi ma ma nub pa'i dus su bla ma la mchod pa chen po byas te /
translated: Setting is the instant of the juncture, the vajra sun is the time when the sun has not set, having made a great offering to the guru,

original: de nyid la phyag rgya ma phul zhing des gnang ba de nyid blangs te /
analyzed: de nyid la phyag rgya ma phul zhing des gnang ba de nyid blangs te /
translated: one should offer the consort to him, and having received his permission,

original: mtshan phyed kyi dus su sgrub pa ni gsang ba'i mchod pa brtsams nas /
analyzed: mtshan phyed kyi dus su sgrub pa ni gsang ba'i mchod pa brtsams nas /
translated: at midnight one should begin the practice, the secret offering.

original: skya rengs 'char ba'i dus ni nang par gyi dus la de kho na nyid /
analyzed: skya rengs 'char ba'i dus ni nang par gyi dus la de kho na nyid /
translated: At the time of dawn, the time of the morning, one should experience reality,

original: nyams su myong zhing sgom pa mchog ni rnal 'byor pa des 'grub par 'gyur ba ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyams su myong zhing sgom pa mchog ni rnal 'byor pa des 'grub par 'gyur ba ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: the supreme meditation, which is accomplished by that yogin, which is the attainment of power.

original: yang na rdo rje ni dga' ba dang nyi ma'i ni mchog tu dga' ba dang / de dag nub pa ni zad par sgrub pa ste lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ba'i phyir brtsam par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje ni dga' ba dang nyi ma'i ni mchog tu dga' ba dang / de dag nub pa ni zad par sgrub pa ste lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ba'i phyir brtsam par bya'o //
translated: Alternatively, the vajra is joy, the sun is supreme joy, and their setting is the accomplishment of the exhaustion of those, which should be begun in order to experience the innate joy.

original: de'i rjes la skya rengs 'char ba'i dus ni snang ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'i dus te /
analyzed: de'i rjes la skya rengs 'char ba'i dus ni snang ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'i dus te /
translated: After that, at the time of dawn, which is the nature of light, is the time of the connate [joy].

original: dus re la bsgom pa mchog ni 'dzin pa'i de kho na nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa 'grub par 'gyur ba ni phyag rgya chen po dmigs par byed do //
analyzed: dus re la bsgom pa mchog ni 'dzin pa'i de kho na nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa 'grub par 'gyur ba ni phyag rgya chen po dmigs par byed do //
translated: The supreme meditation at that time is the accomplishment of the yoga of the awareness of the suchness of the seal, which is the observation of mahƒÅmudrƒÅ.üîΩAlso, in the Praj√±ƒÅpƒÅramitƒÅ in Seven Hundred Lines, it states:

original: rab tu byed pa las kyang bla ma'i zhal gyi drin gyis ni //
analyzed: rab tu byed pa las kyang bla ma'i zhal gyi drin gyis ni //
translated: Through the kindness of the guru‚Äôs face,

original: de nas de ni gsal mthong 'gyur //
analyzed: de nas de ni gsal mthong 'gyur //
translated: then that will be clearly seen.

original: ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang // da ltar byung ba'i srid gsum ste //üîΩ'od gsal rnam par dag pa yis //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang // da ltar byung ba'i srid gsum ste // 'od gsal rnam par dag pa yis //
translated: The three existences of the future, past, and presentüîΩare seen in an instant

original: skad cig gcig gis kun mthong 'gyur //üîΩchu zla smig rgyu la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: skad cig gcig gis kun mthong 'gyur // chu zla smig rgyu la sogs pa'i //
translated: by the pure luminosity.

original: sgyu ma'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan //
translated: The qualities of the illusions of the moon in water, mirages, and so on

original: rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
translated: are adorned with the vajra-like samƒÅdhi.

original: skya rengs shar ba'i dus su ni //
analyzed: skya rengs shar ba'i dus su ni //
translated: At the time of dawn,

original: byang chub shing drung rtsar bzhugs nas //
analyzed: byang chub shing drung rtsar bzhugs nas //
translated: sitting at the foot of the Bodhi tree,

original: des na bdud rnams 'joms par mdzad //
analyzed: des na bdud rnams 'joms par mdzad //
translated: the Buddha defeated the mƒÅras.

original: @209b yang dag ye shes bla na med //
analyzed: @209b yang dag ye shes bla na med //
translated: The unsurpassed, perfect pristine consciousness

original: sh'akya'i mgon pos thob nas ni //
analyzed: sh'akya'i mgon pos thob nas ni //
translated: Is attained by the protector of the ≈öƒÅkyas.

original: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to benefit all sentient beings,

original: de nyid 'dir ni rab tu bstan //
analyzed: de nyid 'dir ni rab tu bstan //
translated: That is taught here.

original: mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristic of manifest enlightenment

original: de nyid ye shes zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes zhes bshad do //
translated: Is explained as pristine consciousness.üîΩThose who commit the five heinous acts,

original: mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // bsod nams dman pa'i mi gang dang ; / yid bzhin nor bu gzhan 'dra ba //
analyzed: mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // bsod nams dman pa'i mi gang dang ; / yid bzhin nor bu gzhan 'dra ba //
translated: Those who have little merit, and those who are like other wish-fulfilling jewels

original: bla ma'i drin gyis thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: bla ma'i drin gyis thob par 'gyur //
translated: Are obtained through the kindness of the guru.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma 'ongs pa //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma 'ongs pa //
translated: The perfect buddhas of the future

original: 'di ni ci 'dod las byed do //
analyzed: 'di ni ci 'dod las byed do //
translated: Do whatever is desired.

original: chags dang chags pa bral ba min //
analyzed: chags dang chags pa bral ba min //
translated: Neither attached nor free from attachment,

original: bar ma yang ni mi dmigs te //
analyzed: bar ma yang ni mi dmigs te //
translated: The middle is also not observed.

original: stong dang stong pa ma yin min //
analyzed: stong dang stong pa ma yin min //
translated: Neither empty nor not empty,

original: bar ma yang ni mi dmigs so ;
analyzed: bar ma yang ni mi dmigs so ;
translated: The middle is also not observed.

original: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste //
translated: And so on.

original: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: de'i rjes la gzhan gyi don bya ba'i phyir rgyan thams cad ni mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / dri dang me tog ni sgyu ma'i dpe rnams kyis brgyan pa rdo rje sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
analyzed: de'i rjes la gzhan gyi don bya ba'i phyir rgyan thams cad ni mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / dri dang me tog ni sgyu ma'i dpe rnams kyis brgyan pa rdo rje sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
translated: After that, in order to benefit others, all ornaments are adorned with the major and minor marks, and scent and flowers are adorned with the examples of illusion.

original: de dag gi mchog ni rdo rje 'chang gi sku //
analyzed: de dag gi mchog ni rdo rje 'chang gi sku //
translated: The supreme of those is the body of Vajradhara.

original: sgom pa ni cig car du spros na grub pa myur du thob par 'gyur zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dang / rang dang gzhan gyi don gyi dngos grub rnal 'byor pas myur du thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgom pa ni cig car du spros na grub pa myur du thob par 'gyur zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dang / rang dang gzhan gyi don gyi dngos grub rnal 'byor pas myur du thob par 'gyur te /
translated: If one meditates on the emanation of all of those at once, one will quickly attain accomplishment.

original: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of self-consecration.

original: rnal 'byor pa de ni sku gsum ni khams gsum pa rnams la mchog sbyin pa ni rjes su gzung ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa de ni sku gsum ni khams gsum pa rnams la mchog sbyin pa ni rjes su gzung ba'o //
translated: That yogin bestows the supreme to the three realms, that is, he takes them into his care.

original: de bzhin du sangs rgyas mtshan ni rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du sangs rgyas mtshan ni rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa ste /
translated: Similarly, the buddha marks are the supernatural powers, and so on.

original: de rnams kyis mtshan par gyur pa ni brgyan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyis mtshan par gyur pa ni brgyan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those are the ornaments.

original: de bzhin du rang gi lus las 'byung ba'i snang bas /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi lus las 'byung ba'i snang bas /
translated: Similarly, the light that arises from one‚Äôs own body

original: dpag tshad brgya ni nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
analyzed: dpag tshad brgya ni nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
translated: indicates a hundred yojanas.

original: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang snang bar byed do //
analyzed: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang snang bar byed do //
translated: It illuminates the trichiliocosm.

original: dbang po gnyis sbyor ba ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis su med pas /
analyzed: dbang po gnyis sbyor ba ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis su med pas /
translated: The union of the two organs is the nonduality of the conventional and ultimate truths.

original: sbyor ba thams cad ni ldang ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba dang 'chag pa rnams brtsam par bya ba ni bya ba ste zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba thams cad ni ldang ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba dang 'chag pa rnams brtsam par bya ba ni bya ba ste zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
translated: All unions are the activities of rising, sitting, sleeping, and walking.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor pa 'di dngos grub thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub rnams kyi dam tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor pa 'di dngos grub thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub rnams kyi dam tshig go //
translated: For that very reason, this yogin is the commitment of all powers, of the mundane and supramundane powers.

original: de nas dam tshig ste de rnams so sor bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dam tshig ste de rnams so sor bshad par bya'o //
translated: Then, the commitments are explained individually.

original: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
translated: In the Pradƒ´poddyotana it says:

original: brtul zhugs phreng ba sngangs pa dang // de la gang yang mi bshad de //
analyzed: brtul zhugs phreng ba sngangs pa dang // de la gang yang mi bshad de //
translated: One should not speak of this to anyone.

original: @210a * // zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: @210a * // zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa la rtag tu dam tshig ni bshang gcis nye bar mtshon pa'i rdzas lnga ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa la rtag tu dam tshig ni bshang gcis nye bar mtshon pa'i rdzas lnga ste /
translated: For one who has attained the Great Seal, the pledge is always the five substances characterized by feces and urine.

original: de rnams bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams bza' bar bya'o //
translated: One should eat them.

original: ji ltar zhen rdo rje grub pa na ye ge gsum gyis brlabs nas so //
analyzed: ji ltar zhen rdo rje grub pa na ye ge gsum gyis brlabs nas so //
translated: How? Having consecrated them with the three seed syllables, as in the Vajra-Daka Sddhana.

original: dngos grub thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dngos grub pa'i phyir dam tshig ni sngags pa'i slob pa shin tu 'da' dka' ba ni spang bar mi bya'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dngos grub pa'i phyir dam tshig ni sngags pa'i slob pa shin tu 'da' dka' ba ni spang bar mi bya'o zhes ston to //
translated: The pledge is not to transgress the difficult-to-conquer training of a mantra practitioner, in order to attain the powers of Vairochana and so forth.

original: de bzhin du /üîΩbshang gci dam tshig la sogs la //
analyzed: de bzhin du / bshang gci dam tshig la sogs la //
translated: Similarly,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: in the pledge of feces and urine, etc.,

original: bshang gci ni srog dang rtsol ba ste /
analyzed: bshang gci ni srog dang rtsol ba ste /
translated: feces and urine are life and exertion.

original: de dag gi dam tshig ni yang dag par sbyor bas /
analyzed: de dag gi dam tshig ni yang dag par sbyor bas /
translated: Their pledge is to unite them perfectly.

original: dbang po gnyis sbyor ba ni 'og dang steng 'gog pa ste ma ning gi bzlas pas /
analyzed: dbang po gnyis sbyor ba ni 'og dang steng 'gog pa ste ma ning gi bzlas pas /
translated: The union of the two organs is the blocking of the lower and upper openings, the neuter repetition.

original: bla na med pa'i phul du byung ba'i dam tshig de kho na nyid 'od gsal ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i phul du byung ba'i dam tshig de kho na nyid 'od gsal ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one achieves the unsurpassed, supreme, commitment, the reality of clear light.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: sangs rgyas ni phung po rnams te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni phung po rnams te /
translated: The Buddha is the aggregates.

original: de dag gi byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa de nyid de /
analyzed: de dag gi byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa de nyid de /
translated: Their enlightenment is non-conceptual wisdom.

original: de nyid kyi gnas so ;
analyzed: de nyid kyi gnas so ;
translated: That is the abode.

original: / zhi ba ni rang bzhin gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhir gyur pa'o //üîΩ'dod pa ni snyoms par zhugs pa dang / thar pa ni bla na med pa'i mngon par byang chub pa dang / dam tshig ni bdud rtsi myong ba dang / rdo rje ni rdo rje bzlas pa gang las 'byung ba de ni de bzhin du bshad pa ste /
analyzed: / zhi ba ni rang bzhin gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhir gyur pa'o // 'dod pa ni snyoms par zhugs pa dang / thar pa ni bla na med pa'i mngon par byang chub pa dang / dam tshig ni bdud rtsi myong ba dang / rdo rje ni rdo rje bzlas pa gang las 'byung ba de ni de bzhin du bshad pa ste /
translated: Peace is the basis of the perfection of the natural meaning.üîΩDesire is the enjoyment of union, liberation is unsurpassed manifest enlightenment, commitment is the experience of nectar, and the vajra is vajra repetition.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o ;
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o ;
translated: That from which they arise is explained as such, that is, as Great Vajradhara.

original: / de ni bsgrub pa dang rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa dag go //
analyzed: / de ni bsgrub pa dang rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa dag go //
translated: That is the stage of practice and vajra repetition.

original: da ni gzhan yang 'gro ba'i don byas pa'i phyir las kyi chogs bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni gzhan yang 'gro ba'i don byas pa'i phyir las kyi chogs bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, moreover, in order to benefit migrating beings, the ritual actions will be explained.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: dam tshig chen po ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: dam tshig chen po ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
translated: The great commitment is Vairochana.

original: de'i khro ba ni 'phags pa gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: de'i khro ba ni 'phags pa gshin rje gshed do //
translated: His wrath is the noble Yamantaka.

original: de nyid kyi rdo rje ni sngags te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi rdo rje ni sngags te /
translated: His vajra is the mantra.

original: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
translated: Having entered into the samadhi called that,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sems can thams cad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sems can thams cad de /
translated: all tathagatas are all sentient beings.

original: de rnams skrag par byed pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams skrag par byed pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams so //
translated: Their terrifiers are the world guardians.

original: de rnams kyi yang khro bo ni gshin rje mthar byed de /
analyzed: de rnams kyi yang khro bo ni gshin rje mthar byed de /
translated: Their wrath is Yamantaka.

original: de dang dbyer med pas sngags kyang de bzhin du bshad pa ste /
analyzed: de dang dbyer med pas sngags kyang de bzhin du bshad pa ste /
translated: Since he is inseparable from that, the mantra is explained in the same way.

original: de nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
translated: His body, etc. is as before.

original: aom ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: aom ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: Om is the recollection of Vairochana.

original: hr'i: ni sgyu ma'i sa bon te gsung gi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: hr'i: ni sgyu ma'i sa bon te gsung gi rang bzhin no //
translated: Hrih is the seed of illusion, the nature of speech.

original: shanri zhes pa ni rnam par gcig pa'i phyir thugs kyi sa bon no //
analyzed: shanri zhes pa ni rnam par gcig pa'i phyir thugs kyi sa bon no //
translated: The hram is the seed syllable of mind, because it is the single part.

original: de bas na sku gsung thugs kyi rang @210b bzhin no //
analyzed: de bas na sku gsung thugs kyi rang @210b bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the nature of body, speech, and mind.

original: bi kri t'a na na zhes pa ni zhal drag po'o //
analyzed: bi kri t'a na na zhes pa ni zhal drag po'o //
translated: The vik·πõtƒÅnana is the wrathful face.

original: sarbba sha tr'u na zhes pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams /
analyzed: sarbba sha tr'u na zhes pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams /
translated: The sarva≈õatr≈´n are the world protectors.

original: n'a sha ya zhes pa 'jigs shig pa'o //
analyzed: n'a sha ya zhes pa 'jigs shig pa'o //
translated: The nƒÅ≈õaya is destroy!

original: 'bros pa de rnams kyang /
analyzed: 'bros pa de rnams kyang /
translated: Those who flee,

original: stvam bha ya zhes pa ni rengs shig pa'o //
analyzed: stvam bha ya zhes pa ni rengs shig pa'o //
translated: the stambhaya is paralyze!

original: h'um ni bskul ba la'o //
analyzed: h'um ni bskul ba la'o //
translated: The hum is for urging.

original: phat ni khros pa la'o //
analyzed: phat ni khros pa la'o //
translated: The phat is for wrath.

original: sv'a h'a ni mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sv'a h'a ni mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The svƒÅhƒÅ is for actualization.

original: da ni sbyor ba bshad par bya ba'i phyir /üîΩdug ni khrag dang kun du sbyar //
analyzed: da ni sbyor ba bshad par bya ba'i phyir / dug ni khrag dang kun du sbyar //
translated: Now, in order to explain the application,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, poison mixed with blood, and so forth.

original: gru gsum pa'i me thab la tsher ma'i me sbar zhing me de yang dang po rgyal rigs sam rje'u'i rigs kyi khang ba nas blangs te /
analyzed: gru gsum pa'i me thab la tsher ma'i me sbar zhing me de yang dang po rgyal rigs sam rje'u'i rigs kyi khang ba nas blangs te /
translated: In a triangular hearth, a fire of thorns is ignited, and that fire is first taken from the house of a k·π£atriya or vai≈õya.

original: gcer bu dang skra dkrol zhing gshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas dug dang khrag dang ske tshe dang lan tshva rnams nyi ma phyed dang mtshan phyed na brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te /
analyzed: gcer bu dang skra dkrol zhing gshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas dug dang khrag dang ske tshe dang lan tshva rnams nyi ma phyed dang mtshan phyed na brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te /
translated: Naked, with loose hair, and with the pride of Yamantaka, one should recite the poison, blood, black mustard seed, and salt one hundred and eight times at midnight or noon.

original: che ge mo 'di zhes bya ba wa sha m'a n'a ya hr'i:/
analyzed: che ge mo 'di zhes bya ba wa sha m'a n'a ya hr'i:/
translated: Reciting so-and-so here, Vasanahaya Hri!

original: zhes pa bu mo'i ming la brten te brjod cing zhag gsum bsregs na de'i tshe bu mo de rengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa bu mo'i ming la brten te brjod cing zhag gsum bsregs na de'i tshe bu mo de rengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: based on the name of the girl, if one burns it for three days, then at that time the girl will be paralyzed.

original: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du yang zhes pa ni gal te rnal 'byor pa dus de tsam gyis 'chi bar mi 'gyur na de'i tshe bskal pa de tsam gyi bar du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes phul du byung ba'i tshig go //
analyzed: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du yang zhes pa ni gal te rnal 'byor pa dus de tsam gyis 'chi bar mi 'gyur na de'i tshe bskal pa de tsam gyi bar du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes phul du byung ba'i tshig go //
translated: The phrase even for three incalculable aeons is an expression of excellence, meaning that if the yogi does not die in that time, then at that time he will be accomplished for that length of time.

original: sangs rgyas ni tshangs pa dang chos 'dzin pa ni khyab 'jug dang / rdo rje sems dpa' ni drag po ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni tshangs pa dang chos 'dzin pa ni khyab 'jug dang / rdo rje sems dpa' ni drag po ste /
translated: Buddha is Brahma, Dharma is Vishnu, and Vajrasattva is Rudra.

original: gal te lha rnams bu mo de rnams kyi bdag po yin pas sgrub pa po'i sbyor ba las 'das par byed na de'i tshe de rnams kyi srog sbyor ba de nyid kyis zad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te lha rnams bu mo de rnams kyi bdag po yin pas sgrub pa po'i sbyor ba las 'das par byed na de'i tshe de rnams kyi srog sbyor ba de nyid kyis zad par 'gyur te /
translated: If the gods are the owners of those girls, and they cause the practitioner to transgress his observances, then at that time their life force will be exhausted by that very observance.

original: mi 'jig pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i sngags 'di yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: mi 'jig pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i sngags 'di yin no zhes ston to //
translated: This is the mantra that has the power to destroy them.

original: 'di nyid kyi sbyor ba gzhan bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi sbyor ba gzhan bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now another application of this is explained:

original: bcu bzhi'am yang na tshes brgyad la //
analyzed: bcu bzhi'am yang na tshes brgyad la //
translated: on the fourteenth or the eighth day of the lunar month,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: mar ngo'i tshes brgyad pa'am bcu bzhi la bud med kyis rjes su 'brang ba'i skyes bu bsregs pa'i sol ba'i dum bu blangs te /
analyzed: mar ngo'i tshes brgyad pa'am bcu bzhi la bud med kyis rjes su 'brang ba'i skyes bu bsregs pa'i sol ba'i dum bu blangs te /
translated: On the eighth or fourteenth day of the dark lunar fortnight, a woman should take a piece of burnt charcoal from the cremation ground.

original: de nyid sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs nas brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te /
analyzed: de nyid sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs nas brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te /
translated: Having empowered it with this mantra, she should recite it one hundred and eight times.

original: gshin rje gshed kyi dmigs pas sol ba de'i cha mgo bo la btab ma des ni sgrub pa po de la ster bar 'gyur ba ni nor dang 'bru la sogs pa ster bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed kyi dmigs pas sol ba de'i cha mgo bo la btab ma des ni sgrub pa po de la ster bar 'gyur ba ni nor dang 'bru la sogs pa ster bar byed pa'o //
translated: By the visualization of Yamantaka, if she touches the head of the person she desires with that piece of charcoal, she will obtain from him whatever she desires, that is, wealth, grain, and so on.

original: de bzhin du sngags 'di nyid kyis dur khrod kyi sol ba'i dum bu byin gyis brlabs la bsgrub bya'i gzugs @211a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du sngags 'di nyid kyis dur khrod kyi sol ba'i dum bu byin gyis brlabs la bsgrub bya'i gzugs @211a * //
translated: Likewise, having blessed a piece of charnel ground char with this mantra, one should make the effigy of the victim.üîΩ

original: thal bas bris te /
analyzed: thal bas bris te /
translated: Likewise, having consecrated a piece of charnel ground charcoal with this very mantra, one should draw the effigy of the victim with that charcoal.

original: 'byung po'i zhag gi nyi ma phyed dang mtshan la /
analyzed: 'byung po'i zhag gi nyi ma phyed dang mtshan la /
translated: On an evil day, at midnight,üîΩwith a fierce mind, one should draw a line on the head of the victim with that piece of charcoal, as if with a saw.

original: sems drag pos bsgrub bya'i mgo bo la sol ba'i dum bu des sog le'i tshul gyi ri mo bris na dgra bo de de ma thag tu gnyis su phye zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems drag pos bsgrub bya'i mgo bo la sol ba'i dum bu des sog le'i tshul gyi ri mo bris na dgra bo de de ma thag tu gnyis su phye zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then the enemy will immediately split in two and die.

original: sngags 'di nyid kyis sal sogs pa las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan la /
analyzed: sngags 'di nyid kyis sal sogs pa las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan la /
translated: With this very mantra, one should make an effigy out of salt and so forth.

original: thob ni rdo rje thob ste brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas la /üîΩde nyid h'um ni rab tu 'bar dang bcas //
analyzed: thob ni rdo rje thob ste brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas la / de nyid h'um ni rab tu 'bar dang bcas //
translated: Having enchanted it one hundred and eight times with the vajra-enchantment,

original: zhes pa ni 'bar ba'i rdo rjes mtshan par bsams te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'bar ba'i rdo rjes mtshan par bsams te /
translated: one should imagine that it is marked with a blazing vajra.

original: de'i mgo bo la drag po'i sems kyis mngon spyod kyi zhag la phab na bsgrub bya shi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i mgo bo la drag po'i sems kyis mngon spyod kyi zhag la phab na bsgrub bya shi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one strikes the head of the victim with it on an evil day with a fierce mind, the victim will die.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gdug pa thams cad ni bla ma la sogs pa smod pa rnams rdo rje tho pa 'dis 'jig par byed do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gdug pa thams cad ni bla ma la sogs pa smod pa rnams rdo rje tho pa 'dis 'jig par byed do //
translated: Therefore, all evildoers, those who revile the guru and so on, are destroyed by this vajra hammer.

original: phyag na rdo rje'i rigs ni gal te de'i rigs la gdug pa yod na de yang 'jig par 'gyur to /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje'i rigs ni gal te de'i rigs la gdug pa yod na de yang 'jig par 'gyur to /
translated: The vajra family of Vajrapani, if there is any evildoer in that family, he too will be destroyed.

original: nus pa bstan to //
analyzed: nus pa bstan to //
translated: The power has been taught.

original: de bzhin du sngags 'di nyid kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i sta re byin gyi rlabs kyis brlabs te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sngags 'di nyid kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i sta re byin gyi rlabs kyis brlabs te /
translated: Similarly, by this very mantra, one should consecrate an axe marked with a vajra.

original: mngon spyod kyi rdzas rnams kyis dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan bris te /
analyzed: mngon spyod kyi rdzas rnams kyis dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan bris te /
translated: One should draw the image of an enemy with substances for destroying enemies.

original: dmar po la sogs pa'i rdo rgyus kyi sta res skyes pa'am bud med kyi mgrin pa bcad na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dmar po la sogs pa'i rdo rgyus kyi sta res skyes pa'am bud med kyi mgrin pa bcad na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one cuts the throat of a man or woman with an axe of red arsenic and so on, they will die.

original: sbyor ba 'dis sangs rgyas ni gzhan gyi sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang / sku gsum ni lus ngag yid kyi rin chen mchog ni phul du byung pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba 'dis sangs rgyas ni gzhan gyi sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang / sku gsum ni lus ngag yid kyi rin chen mchog ni phul du byung pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa ste /
translated: By this method, the Buddha, skilled in other's applications, and the three bodies, endowed with the nature of the supreme jewel of body, speech, and mind,

original: sems can kun la phan 'dod pa ni sems can kun ni nor phrogs te bdag la phan 'dod pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gdug pa rgyal po la sogs pa gal te yin na de'i tshe gnad par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: sems can kun la phan 'dod pa ni sems can kun ni nor phrogs te bdag la phan 'dod pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gdug pa rgyal po la sogs pa gal te yin na de'i tshe gnad par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: If the king and so forth are so wicked as to steal the wealth of all sentient beings and benefit themselves, then they will be killed or die.

original: shi bar 'gyur ro zhes 'dir the tshom med do //
analyzed: shi bar 'gyur ro zhes 'dir the tshom med do //
translated: There is no doubt about this.

original: sngags 'di nyid kyis gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas las kyi rdo rje ni sna tshogs rdo rje ste /
analyzed: sngags 'di nyid kyis gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas las kyi rdo rje ni sna tshogs rdo rje ste /
translated: The vajra of action of the yoga practitioner of Yamantaka, by this very mantra, is the crossed vajra.

original: me stag mang po 'khrig pa can ni 'od zer gyi tshogs spro bar bsams te /
analyzed: me stag mang po 'khrig pa can ni 'od zer gyi tshogs spro bar bsams te /
translated: Having imagined a mass of sparks, a multitude of light rays radiating,

original: de'i dbus su yang yi ge h'um las byung ba'i nyi ma bcu gnyis kyi 'od dang 'dra ba'i khro bo rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom zhing de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor los sprin gyi rgyun rnams bskams na chu rengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i dbus su yang yi ge h'um las byung ba'i nyi ma bcu gnyis kyi 'od dang 'dra ba'i khro bo rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom zhing de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor los sprin gyi rgyun rnams bskams na chu rengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: in the middle of that, one should meditate on the wrathful five-pronged vajra, the color of twelve suns arisen from the syllable h≈´·πÉ. If the stream of clouds is dried up by the wheel of light rays arisen from that, the water will be immobilized.

original: de bzhin du slob dpon gyi rigs gang yang rung bas dkyil 'khor bri bar brtsams na de la gal te rlung la sogs @211b pa'i bgegs rnams 'byung na 'dir mche ba'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya bcings nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du slob dpon gyi rigs gang yang rung bas dkyil 'khor bri bar brtsams na de la gal te rlung la sogs @211b pa'i bgegs rnams 'byung na 'dir mche ba'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya bcings nas /
translated: Likewise, if any master of any type begins to draw a ma·πá·∏çala, and if obstacles such as wind arise, here, having formed the fang mudrƒÅ, the vajra-yak·π£a mudrƒÅ,

original: gdug pa'i dgra ni gshin rje gshed de nyid dran par bya ba ni de'i bsam gtan dmigs par bya zhing de nyid kyi sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gdug pa'i dgra ni gshin rje gshed de nyid dran par bya ba ni de'i bsam gtan dmigs par bya zhing de nyid kyi sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
translated: the enemy of the wicked is just the wrathful YamƒÅntaka.

original: de ltar byas na gal te sangs rgyas ni lha rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni lha ma yin rnams kyis bgegs de sprul par gyur na yang de'i tshe mthong ba tsam gyis ni rnal 'byor pas bltas pa tsam gyis 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar byas na gal te sangs rgyas ni lha rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni lha ma yin rnams kyis bgegs de sprul par gyur na yang de'i tshe mthong ba tsam gyis ni rnal 'byor pas bltas pa tsam gyis 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the obstacles are emanated by gods or by asuras, if the yogin just sees them, they will be destroyed by just looking at them.

original: gzhan yang gal te 'bigs byed la sogs pa'i dgon pa rnams su 'gro ba yin na /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te 'bigs byed la sogs pa'i dgon pa rnams su 'gro ba yin na /
translated: Moreover, if one goes to the wilderness, such as the Vindhya,

original: de'i tshe sangs rgyas ni gzhan gsod pa la mkhas ba seng ge la sogs pa dang / byang chub ni mi snang bar byed pa /
analyzed: de'i tshe sangs rgyas ni gzhan gsod pa la mkhas ba seng ge la sogs pa dang / byang chub ni mi snang bar byed pa /
translated: At that time, the Buddha is the one skilled in killing others, such as the lion, and enlightenment is the one who makes invisible.

original: sems ni bsam pa gang la yod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: sems ni bsam pa gang la yod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /
translated: The one who has the thought of enlightenment is the bodhisattva.

original: phra men ma la sogs pa dang de bzhin gzhan gdug pa ni sprul dang sbyang ki dang chu srin la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: phra men ma la sogs pa dang de bzhin gzhan gdug pa ni sprul dang sbyang ki dang chu srin la sogs pa ste /
translated: The other evil ones are the rakshasa and so forth, and the other evil ones are the snake, the jackal, the crocodile and so forth.

original: de rnams sngags 'di dang bsam gtan gyis skrag par byas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams sngags 'di dang bsam gtan gyis skrag par byas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If those are frightened by this mantra and concentration, they will die.

original: khyad par bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: khyad par bshad par bya ste /
translated: The special explanation is to be done.

original: sngags thams cad ni kho bo'i sngags rnams kyi sa gsang ba ni sba bar bya ba dang / snying po ni dga' bar byed pas na nus pa skyed par byed pa phat to //
analyzed: sngags thams cad ni kho bo'i sngags rnams kyi sa gsang ba ni sba bar bya ba dang / snying po ni dga' bar byed pas na nus pa skyed par byed pa phat to //
translated: All mantras are my mantras. The secret is to be concealed, and the essence is to be delighted, so it generates power, phat.

original: 'di dang po brjod la phyi nas aom hri zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod na gdug pa 'chi bar 'gyur te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dang po brjod la phyi nas aom hri zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod na gdug pa 'chi bar 'gyur te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: If this is said first and then om hrih and so forth are said, the evil one will die. This is the creation stage.

original: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the special meditative stabilization of the yoga of the completion stage,üîΩ

original: ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /üîΩye shes ni 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i sems dpa' ni ye shes sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / ye shes ni 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i sems dpa' ni ye shes sems dpa' ste /
translated: Now, in order to teach the special meditative concentration of the yoga practitioners of the completion stage, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares the wisdom being, etc.üîΩThe wisdom being is the being arisen from clear light.

original: ye shes kyi sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ye shes kyi sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúwisdom body‚Äù is the meaning of ‚Äúwisdom being.‚Äù

original: don sbyor ba ni de la dmigs shing /
analyzed: don sbyor ba ni de la dmigs shing /
translated: The application of the meaning is the observation of that.

original: dbus su ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sku'i rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po la gang yang rung ba'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: dbus su ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sku'i rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po la gang yang rung ba'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In the middle, in the middle of the moon ma·πá·∏çala, one should meditate on the body vajra, the great Vajradhara, any body.

original: gnas bzhi ni lkog ma dang snying ga dang lte ba dang / gsang ba rnams /üîΩsngags zhes pa ni sngags kyi ngo bo'i dbye ba shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
analyzed: gnas bzhi ni lkog ma dang snying ga dang lte ba dang / gsang ba rnams / sngags zhes pa ni sngags kyi ngo bo'i dbye ba shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
translated: The four places are the throat, heart, navel, and secret places.

original: bud med ni spyan la sogs pa gzhan pa ni de la gnas par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bud med ni spyan la sogs pa gzhan pa ni de la gnas par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The mantra is the mantra-nature. The yogin who knows the division should meditate on the woman, i.e., LocanƒÅ, etc., and the others, i.e., those abiding in her.

original: de nas rgyan rnams thams cad kyis rdzogs pa ni dmar @212a * //
analyzed: de nas rgyan rnams thams cad kyis rdzogs pa ni dmar @212a * //
translated: Then, the complete adornment with all ornaments is the redüîΩvajra-cross.üîΩ

original: po dang dkar po dang nag po dang ser po'i mdog dang ldan pa'i rlung rnams so //
analyzed: po dang dkar po dang nag po dang ser po'i mdog dang ldan pa'i rlung rnams so //
translated: Then, ‚Äúadorned with all ornaments‚Äù means the winds, which have the colors red, white, black, and yellow.üîΩ‚ÄúMarked with all signs‚Äù means the winds that move to the right, to the left, to both, and slowly.

original: mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan pa ni g-yas dang g-yon dang gnyis ka dang dal bus dman par gyur pas spro zhing padmo ni yi ge aa dang rgyas pa ni aom dang sngags 'di ni thugs kyi sa bon te /
analyzed: mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan pa ni g-yas dang g-yon dang gnyis ka dang dal bus dman par gyur pas spro zhing padmo ni yi ge aa dang rgyas pa ni aom dang sngags 'di ni thugs kyi sa bon te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe lotus is opened by the syllable A‚Äù means the seed syllable of the mind, which is the syllable A.

original: de'i rjes la bsgom par bya ste dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la bsgom par bya ste dgod par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThen one should meditate‚Äù means one should visualize.üîΩ‚ÄúThe syllable A‚Äù is the seed syllable of the body, which is the syllable A.üîΩ‚ÄúThe syllable O‚Äù is the seed syllable of speech, which is the syllable O.üîΩ‚ÄúThe syllable H≈™M‚Äù is the seed syllable of mind, which is the syllable H≈™M.üîΩ‚ÄúThose‚Äù are the three seed syllables.üîΩ‚ÄúThe five lights‚Äù are the five colors.

original: aom a'a: h'um de dag 'od zer lnga'i dbye bas ni spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim gyis rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin bsgom zhing spros la yang rang gi lus la sogs pa la phab pa ni bsdu bar bya'o //

analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor pas byang chub ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //

original: de ma thag pa ni bzlas ma thag tu ldang na /

analyzed: sems dpa' thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku ste /

translated: As before, the yogas of Ak·π£obhya and so on, having found the girls of the outcaste and so on, endowed with the good qualities of good complexion and so on, in a solitary place,üîΩmake offerings preceded by the process of mantra and seal,

original: ba'i mchod pa ni snyoms par zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid can byas te /

analyzed: de ltar gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba bla ma las rnyed pa gang yin pa de yang dang yang du slob pa'i phyir rim pa de bstan to //

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /

analyzed: bshang ba las byung srog chags las //

analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa gang yang rung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to explain the special samƒÅdhi of the yoga of the completion stage, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚Äúany vajra-holder,‚Äù and so on.

analyzed: re zhig dang po rnal 'byor mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas 'od gsal ba la zhugs te /

analyzed: de'i rjes la phyag rgya chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang yang rung ba'i sku la dmigs te /

analyzed: de ni de dang 'dra ba ni de'i dngos grub gtso bor gyur pa dang / dpal ldan ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya ma dang ldan pa'i phyir te /
translated: The word mahasthamaprƒÅpta means he who has attained the great power.

analyzed: stobs chen ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / pha rol gnon pa ni mngon par shes pa drug gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin no //

analyzed: dpag tshad bye ba ni rgya che ba gang zhig steng du tshangs pa'i sgo ste /

analyzed: de'i steng du rdo rje bzhin du mnyam pas 'gro bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: stong gsum ni 'jig rten gyi khams te der yang der ni 'og dang steng gi dbye bas 'gro bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i phyir dpal ldan no //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra ba'i 'od gang la yod pa de ni bshad pa ste /

analyzed: rang gi lus po'i 'od zer rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku rnams spro bar byed pa'o zhes ston to //

analyzed: 'dod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul lnga ste /

analyzed: de la gnas pa'i gang zhig bu mo ni ye shes skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa drug go //

analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i lha'i longs spyod ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam pa'o //

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //

analyzed: dam tshig ni ye shes rnams dang tha mal pa'i lus te /
translated: Commitment is the pristine consciousnesses and the ordinary body.üîΩThat which makes them invisible is the appearance itself.

analyzed: de rnams mi snang ba ni snang ba nyid du gang gis mdzad pa de lta bu'i rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal to zhes bsdus pa'i tshig ste /üîΩzung 'jug dang sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o //üîΩde nas sangs rgyas rab dgyes dag /üîΩces bya ba la sogs pa la /üîΩde nas ni de'i 'og tu'o //üîΩsangs rgyas ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Thus, the words of the concise explanation are ‚Äúthus Vajradhara said.‚Äù

original: gsan pas rab tu dgyes pa dang / sems 'khrul pa ni thugs 'khrul ba la ldog pas /
analyzed: gsan pas rab tu dgyes pa dang / sems 'khrul pa ni thugs 'khrul ba la ldog pas /
translated: The hearing is the great delight, and the mind is the thought of the mind, which is the opposite of delusion.

original: yid la dbang ba ni bsam pa'i sgo nas ye shes kyi snang ba thob pa dang ; spyan gdangs pa ni sgom pa'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: yid la dbang ba ni bsam pa'i sgo nas ye shes kyi snang ba thob pa dang ; spyan gdangs pa ni sgom pa'i sgo nas te /
translated: The mental control is the attainment of the appearance of intuition by way of thought, and the open eyes is by way of meditation.

analyzed: gsung ni 'di skad ces pa ni dgyes pa'i ngag bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: The speech is the statement of the delighted speech.

original: de nyid bshad par bya ba ste ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ae ma'o zhes pa ni ngo mtshar ba ste /üîΩsgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: de nyid bshad par bya ba ste ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ae ma'o zhes pa ni ngo mtshar ba ste / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The that itself is to be explained, beginning with Amazing! and so on. The amazing is the illusion-like meditative stabilization.

original: gsang gnas ni sngags kyi tshig rnams te ;
analyzed: gsang gnas ni sngags kyi tshig rnams te ;
translated: The secret place is the mantra words, and the accomplishment is the accomplishment of the mantra words.

analyzed: de dag gis 'grub pa gang zhig mi 'gyur ba ni mi 'jigs pa'i las kyi tshogs te /
translated: The fearlessness is the accumulation of the activities, and the unwavering is the unwavering mind.

original: de yang ngo mtshar ba'o //

analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa ni 'od gsal ba rtogs pa dang / chos ni sngags kyi sku ste /
translated: The pure by nature is the realization of the clear light, and the dharma is the mantra body.

original: de yang shin tu dri med ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste /
analyzed: de yang shin tu dri med ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste /
translated: That is also very stainless, which is non-conceptuality.

original: de yang shin tu ngo mtshar ba'o //üîΩde nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de yang shin tu ngo mtshar ba'o // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig gsan ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig gsan ma thag tu'o //
translated: Then, having heard the Tathagata's words,

analyzed: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma rnams te /
translated: the vajra is the signs of the Tathagata's clan,üîΩand he who holds that is the vajra-holder,

analyzed: de nyid 'dzin pa ni spyi bor 'dzin por 'dzin pas ni rdo rje 'dzin no //

analyzed: rigs kyi dbye bas ston par mdzad pas na ston pa'o //

translated: He is the producer because he produces the emanations of the world.

analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang sogs pa'i phyir mi 'gyur che'o //

original: dag pa rdo rje ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: dag pa rdo rje ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
translated: The pure vajra is the gnosis of the dharma-dhƒÅtu.

analyzed: de nyid las chos chen po ni lha 'byung ba gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin du bshad pa'o //

original: bcom ldan @214a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan @214a * //
translated: The Blessed One

original: sems dpa' rdo rje sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rje sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of the sattva and vajra,

translated: In the phrase ‚Äúheroic vajra,‚Äù the ‚Äúheroic vajra‚Äù is Ak·π£hobhya.üîΩHis ‚Äúapplication‚Äù is the consecration of that very [Ak·π£hobhya]. The ‚Äúvajra holders‚Äù are those of the Ak·π£hobhya clan. ‚Äú

analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ni de nyid kyi dbang bskur bas rdo rje 'dzin rnams ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs can rnams mnyes par gyur pa ni cod pan bya'o //

original: rdo rje sa'i snying po la sogs pa dang / spyan gyi gzugs la sogs pa ni spyan dang gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: de rnams la yang sangs rgyas rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad de nyid kyis rab bsgom pa ni cod pan bya'o //
translated: For them, the Buddha Vajra is Vairocana himself, who should be visualized as the crown.

original: rig pa'i rgyal po ni mi bskyod pa ste /
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po ni mi bskyod pa ste /
translated: The King of Knowledge is Akshobhya.

original: gang gi tshe de nyid sku mdog nag mo yin na de'i tshe thugs rdo rjes cod pan du bya ste khyad par ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de nyid sku mdog nag mo yin na de'i tshe thugs rdo rjes cod pan du bya ste khyad par ro //

analyzed: gang gi phyir m'a ma k'i ni rigs gnyis pa yin no //

analyzed: de rnams kyi dbu la 'od dpag tu med pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on AmitƒÅbha on their heads.

original: de rnams la gdon mi za ba ni don yod grub pas cod pan bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de rnams la gdon mi za ba ni don yod grub pas cod pan bya ba yin no //

original: sngags rnams thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sngags rnams thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: For all the mantras, Ak·π£obhya and so forth,

original: de rnams la rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'chang chen po dang / mi bskyod pas @214b cod pan du bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams la rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'chang chen po dang / mi bskyod pas @214b cod pan du bya'o //

original: gnod sbyin ma ni rdo rje ro langs ma la sogs pa dang / sngags rgyud ni khro gnyer ma dang rdo rjes 'dzin ma dang / ral pa gcig ma la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gnod sbyin ma ni rdo rje ro langs ma la sogs pa dang / sngags rgyud ni khro gnyer ma dang rdo rjes 'dzin ma dang / ral pa gcig ma la sogs pa ste /
translated: For the yak·π£i·πáƒ´s such as Vajavega, and for the mantra-tantras such as Bh·πõku·π≠ƒ´, VajradhƒÅrƒ´, and Ekavƒ´rƒÅ,

original: de rnams la gshin rje gshed kyis cod pan du bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams la gshin rje gshed kyis cod pan du bya'o //
translated: one should make YamƒÅntaka their crown ornament.

original: sngags rnams thams cad ni phyi nas gsungs pa'i khro gnyer ma la sogs pa'i spyi bor bskul ba ni rgyas gdab pa ste /
analyzed: sngags rnams thams cad ni phyi nas gsungs pa'i khro gnyer ma la sogs pa'i spyi bor bskul ba ni rgyas gdab pa ste /
translated: All the mantras are sealed by the invocation on the crown of the previously mentioned Khatavarnini, etc.

original: rigs dang rjes su mthun pas shis pa ni 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: rigs dang rjes su mthun pas shis pa ni 'dod pa yin no //
translated: The auspiciousness in accordance with the family is the desired object.

original: dam tshig chen po ni rang rang gi rigs kyis rgyas btab pa la /
analyzed: dam tshig chen po ni rang rang gi rigs kyis rgyas btab pa la /
translated: The great commitment is the sealing by one's own family.

original: rdo rje ni dbang dang ldan pa ste rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: rdo rje ni dbang dang ldan pa ste rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: The vajra is the empowerment, and it is to be applied to the statement by Great Vajradhara.

original: bsam gtan 'khor lo 'dis zhes pa ni 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i cod pan byed pa'i bsam gtan gyi tshogs kyis /
analyzed: bsam gtan 'khor lo 'dis zhes pa ni 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i cod pan byed pa'i bsam gtan gyi tshogs kyis /
translated: This wheel of contemplation is the collection of the contemplations that were just explained, which are the making of the diadem.

original: sngags ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes pa ni drin byed pa dang / dkyil 'khor ni de nyid snying por gyur pa dang / rang gi rigs rjes su dran pa'i phyir sgrub pa po rnams la yang phan pa'o //
analyzed: sngags ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes pa ni drin byed pa dang / dkyil 'khor ni de nyid snying por gyur pa dang / rang gi rigs rjes su dran pa'i phyir sgrub pa po rnams la yang phan pa'o //
translated: The mantras are pleasing to the Tathagatas, who are the benefactors, and the mandalas are their essence, and they are also beneficial to the practitioners because they recollect their own family.

original: de bzhin du dam tshig chen po ni rdo rje 'chang /
analyzed: de bzhin du dam tshig chen po ni rdo rje 'chang /
translated: Similarly, the great commitment is Vajradhara.

original: sgrub pa ni thob par byed pa ste /
analyzed: sgrub pa ni thob par byed pa ste /
translated: Attainment is the means of obtaining it.üîΩ

original: las kyi rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: las kyi rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: Accomplishment is the attainment of the supreme state of victory, which is the samadhi of the supreme state of victory.

original: da ni dbab pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni dbab pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the procedure of descent should be explained.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then and so forth.

original: rdo rje ni snod 'dus byas pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni snod 'dus byas pa ste /
translated: The vajra is the created vessel.

original: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: Because he holds that, he is the vajra-holder.

original: lus ngag yid rnam par dag par mdzad pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: lus ngag yid rnam par dag par mdzad pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because he purifies body, speech, and mind.

original: chos rnams kun ni rengs pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: chos rnams kun ni rengs pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: All phenomena are paralysis and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi dbang phyug ni byed pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dbang phyug ni byed pa'o //
translated: He is the lord of those, because he acts.

original: de rnams bstan pas na gtso bo'o //
analyzed: de rnams bstan pas na gtso bo'o //
translated: He is the chief because he teaches those.

original: sku gsung thugs ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ste /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ste /
translated: The body, speech, and mind are the past, future, and present.

original: de rnams yang dag par mkhyen pas na rdzogs sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: de rnams yang dag par mkhyen pas na rdzogs sangs rgyas so //
translated: He is the perfect Buddha because he knows those.

original: bcom ldan 'das des ye shes ni snod de /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des ye shes ni snod de /
translated: The wisdom of that Bhagavan is the vessel.

original: de'i rdo rje ni dbab pa'i cho ga bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rdo rje ni dbab pa'i cho ga bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: The vajra of that is the proclamation of the procedure of descent.

original: de nyid bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid bshad par bya ste /
translated: That itself should be explained.

original: ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The peak of the mountain is a place of delight, and so forth.

original: ri bo'i rtse mo dang rab tu dben pa ni dgon pa chen po la sogs pa'i gnas te /
analyzed: ri bo'i rtse mo dang rab tu dben pa ni dgon pa chen po la sogs pa'i gnas te /
translated: The peak of the mountain and the secluded place are the sites of the great forest and so forth.

original: nyams dga' ba ni me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i gnas su /
analyzed: nyams dga' ba ni me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i gnas su /
translated: The place of delight is a site endowed with flowers, fruits, and so forth.

original: bsam gtan rdo rje ni mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin te de bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rdo rje ni mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin te de bya'o //
translated: The vajra of meditation is the unshakable samadhi, and that is to be done.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: bzlas sngags ni dbab pa'i sngags rnams te /üîΩde rnams @215a * //
analyzed: bzlas sngags ni dbab pa'i sngags rnams te / de rnams @215a * //
translated: The mantras are the mantras of descent.

original: kyi sbyor ba ni yang dag par sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: kyi sbyor ba ni yang dag par sbyor ba ste /
translated: Those are the yoga, that is, the correct application.

original: de'i phyir ro zhes ston to //
analyzed: de'i phyir ro zhes ston to //
translated: That is why it is taught.

original: gang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni snod gzhan la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te de dag thams cad //
analyzed: gang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni snod gzhan la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te de dag thams cad //
translated: The vajra of all tathagatas are the tathagatas dwelling in other vessels, and all of them.
